title: Ura Dungeon Okusan
description: After the Demon King was slain, a "hidden dungeon" suddenly appeared in a frontier town, said to be overrun by unimaginable monsters and to hold unbelievable treasures!! The newlywed Yui, about to attempt the dungeon, carries a certain secret...!? The level-99 martial artist who saved the world changes jobs to a level-1 housewife, only to be dragged into tackling a brutal dungeon!

title: Amano Megumi wa Suki Darake!
description: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.

title: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi Hen
description:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shirotaka](https://mangadex.org/author/38c0c039-c347-42fa-a196-3d0315451b4c)
___
**Note:** MangaDex's chapter numbering follows the series' magazine chapter numbering.

title: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~
description:
The mom characters who appear in the game *MamaFan* are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. 

"Why... Why do such cute moms have to die?!"

Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)
- [Official X/Twitter Account](https://x.com/oominemanga)

title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
description: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

title: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!
description: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!

title: Otonari no Oneesan ni Arekore sareru Manga
description:
22 year old Chia regularly stops by the apartment of her neighbor Kento every day. Kento is a third-year junior high school student who is often busy studying for exams. Chia's feminine charms keep tension with him whenever they are together.

A comedy about the age difference between a teenage boy and an older woman.

title: The Basketball Girl
description: The unknown interior designer, Hans Duan (22 years old), was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately, he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison, he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However, the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?

title: Tsuihou Sareta Maou wa Chikyuu wo Mezasu!
description: Exiled by her own kind and sealed by a hero, the demon lord is finally revived after an eternity. She awakens in a wasteland, with a dark sky full of twinkling stars. The air feels thinner, and her body strangely light... After gathering herself and trying to sense the hero's presence, it seems the hero is on a distant blue planet in the sky...? She doesn't know exactly where she is, but one thing is certain: the demon lord will fight to defeat the hero!

title: Mild 7
description:
Nagai's ecchi parody of Mikiya Mochizuki's [Wild 7](https://mangadex.org/title/b5e3ba0f-f735-4a32-a617-2bd3db500091/wild-7?tab=chapters)

(from ebookjapan):

The Seven Soldier Family is the world's most powerful mercenary family. We call them the "Mild 7"!  Wherever they go, they have no enemies. Where the Mild 7 goes, Mild 7 kills everyone who stands in their way! Led by hippie dad Dolaemon, 36 years old, the Mild 7 make use of machine guns, missiles, rockets, tanks, fighter planes, and even a submarine battleship, the Yamato, which was converted from the sunken Yamato, in their basement. 

This is Go Nagai's quintessential masterpiece, a messily erotic and violent work!

title: Kaijin Fugeki
description: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!

title: Shinyaku Seisho
description: The story of Jesus Christ told through Manga.

title: Chiikawa: Nanka Chiisakute Kawaii Yatsu (Webcomic Pages)
description: Follow the adventures of Chiikawa the innocent cute creature, Hachiware the kind cat, and Usagi the chaotic rabbit as they work their hardest to survive in a world filled with dangerous monsters, mysterious armored taskmasters, and fantastical phenomena at every turn!

title: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kami-gee ni Idoman to su~
description:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called "trash games" and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, "god-tier" VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku's years of "trash game" experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?

title: Otona ni Narenai Bokura wa
description: A silly and endless story about how some kids kill time while repeating July 7th every day.

title: Yoshibari ◇ Aubade
description: Haruomi and Yua grew up together but with puberty Haruomi begun to change, beginning taking pictures of girls annoying his childhood friend Yua! Haruomi though has a secret power awakening and their innocent relationship is about to change in many levels! A touch of vampire, a bit of bondage, a taste of harem and some wrestling added to mix make it quite a unique manga...

title: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!
description:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.

title: I'm a Mom
description: A world full of zombies, where my daughter lives. "Don't worry, dear.. Mommy will protect you, even if l become a monster...!"

title: Misao no Keiyaku
description: Muramoto is a dull university professor despised by his wife and disrespected by his students. His only salvation is the presence of Yoshino Misao, who treats him favorably. However, he discovers that his wife is having an affair. Muramoto, sinking into despair, is gently embraced by Misao...

title: Saikou Nando Meikyuu de Party ni Okizari ni Sareta S-Rank Kenshi, Hontou ni Mayoimakutte Dare mo Shiranai Saishinbu e: Ore no Kan dato Tabun Kocchi ga Deguchi da to Omou
description:
The swordsman, Jir, had just joined a well-known S-rank party when he finds himself stranded all alone in the hardest labyrinth. Normally, there’s no way to survive such a situation other than to wait for rescue. Relying on nothing but his heroic sword skills, Jir decides to escape on his own! “Heh! You’re all bark and no bite, Labyrinth!” he boldly declares. Due to his extremely poor sense of direction, he’s completely unaware that he’s headed towards the deepest level where the labyrinth boss awaits!!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)

title: Hima-Ten!
description: High school home economics expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class.

title: Those Who Hunt Elves
description:
Junpei, a thick-headed martial artist. Ritsuko, tomboy and gun Otaku. Airi, award winning actress. These three are transported from their homes in Japan to a High Fantasy parallel world. Enlisting the aid of the most powerful elven sorceress in the land, they try— and fail —to cast a spell that will return them home. The result? The spell is made manifest as fragments on the bodies of five elven women throughout the land. To return home, they have to collect the fragments of the spell and join them into a working spell.  
  
The catch? They don't know precisely which elves have fragments of the spell on them. The solution? Find every elf woman in the land and take off their clothes.

title: Aisai no Ura Aka
description: When Sousuke Yamada stumbles upon a shocking video online, his life is shattered. A woman who looks exactly like his wife is caught in an intimate act, filmed in their daughter's elementary school classroom. Is it really her? Who is this other man? Just how will Sousuke uncover the culprit hiding among the PTA's members?

title: Ekiden Bros
description: Nobunaga grew up at a dormitory full of long-distance runners training for the Ekiden marathon. He dreams of being a runner, but struggles to take the first step. But when he gets pulled into a race at school, he'll catch the attention of the running club.

title: Shy
description:
In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
___
[Official X](https://x.com/SHY_off)

From Yen Press:
Earth was on the brink of a third World War when super-powered individuals came forth from each country around the globe, ending the conflict and ushering in a new era of relative peace. Among those heroes, Japan is represented by a timid young girl known as “Shy.” She may spend more time worrying about her own shortcomings than she does battling villains, but she'll show the world that despite it all she still has the heart of a hero.

title: Sailor Uniform and Tank
description: Shimada Kanon aims to be the strongest tank crew in the Kantou region. With her best friends Mariko, Mutsumi and their World War II-era Panther V, they form the Nora Middle School Tank Fanclub. Unfortunately, as they have no sponsor to fund their effort, their dream is still just that. However, a chance to make a name for themselves arrives when delinquents come knocking on their school's door riding T-55s...

title: Youheidan no Ryouriban
description: The story begins when Azuma Shuri, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gungrave, the leader of a mercenary group. Shuri joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Shuri connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Shuri is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Shuri does not yet know that he will become a hero.

title: Pantser Princess
description: The Kingdom of Commons is a continent located in North Arcadia. Mitia Commons is the princess of the kingdom, and she is so extremely shy that she has barely ever ventured outside of the castle. Now, out of the blur, her mother, the queen, declares that she must go through a ritual in order to become qualified for the throne. The ritual requires that Mitia to collect four powerful stones to complete a magical staff. By doing so, she will overcome her extreme shyness. She embarks on an adventure with her friend and bodyguard, Atty and Sasha, in order to search for these four stones.

title: Hacking Ghost: Karada ni Shika Kachi no Nai Gakuen
description: In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei will kill him. With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability...

title: Mudameshi Kurai Nintei Sareta node Aiso o Tsukashi, Teikoku ni Utsute Shusse Suru
description: In the kingdom Lutz lived in until now, commoners were unable to climb up the social ladder, their efforts were denied and extra work disregarded. Lutz finally got fed up, and decided to move to the Empire, which was a complete meritocracy. It was a wonderful country where hard work and creativity was valued. Moreover, Lutz's special magic, which was seen to be useless in the kingdom, is able to beat platoon level monsters in the Empire! Lutz decides to set off in this new land, where values are upheld, rewards are given, and there's a simple path to get ahead in life!

title: Kimi wa Shuumatsu
description:
An 'apocalyptic' boy-meets-girl rom-com about high school boy Yutaka Kuromori and the beautiful, popular girl adored by everyone, Aru Hoshina. Yutaka might shyly deny it, insisting “we’re not dating”, but Aru is always clinging to him, and the two are seen as the talk-of-the-school couple.

But behind what looks like an ordinary boy–girl high school relationship lies a secret — one so ruinous and capricious that, if mishandled, it could bring about the end of the world.

title: Starting Today, We’re Childhood Friends
description:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

title: Saitei Rank no Boukensha, Yuusha Shoujo wo Sodateru Orette
description: The old man who joined just to fill out the party is actually a legendary adventurer!? A hidden hero turns a talented S-class party of beautiful girls into full-fledged heroes! The greatest training fantasy from "Let's Become a Novelist"!!

title: S-Rank Boukensha de Aru Ore no Musume-tachi wa Juudo no Father-con deshita
description: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!

title: Manga Yonin Shosei
description:
From Stone Bridge Press :
A "documentary comic book" from 1931, depicting the true adventures of four young Japanese men in America. Originally published in Japanese in San Francisco in 1931, The Four Immigrants Manga is Henry Kiyama’s visual chronicle of his immigrant experiences in the United States. Drawn in a classic gag-strip comic-book style, this heartfelt tale, rediscovered and translated by manga expert Frederik L. Schodt, is a fascinating, entertaining depiction of early Asian American struggles.

Note: Won in the Heritage Selection category at the 51st Angoulême International Comics Festival in 2024

title: Ensmile
description:
I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller

title: Satanophany
description: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people.

title: Haimiya-senpai [Pixiv Edition]
description: Super Scary Senpai who's only nice to me...

title: Ultimate Exorcist Kiyoshi
description:
The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/ultimate-exorcist-kiyoshi)

title: Eroge no Sekai de Slow Life ~Issho ni Isekai Teni shitekita Yarisaa no Daigakusei-tachi ni Tsuihou sareta node, Henkyou de Muteki ni Natte Shin no Heroine-tachi to Yoroshiku Yarimasu~
description:
The more you do it, the stronger you get!? Iijima Satoru. 32 years old. Virgin. Today, he was idly masturbating while listening to the vibrator of the woman living upstairs... but suddenly the ceiling collapsed, and the woman, completely exposed from the waist down, fell! And then... she landed on him...?!

He suddenly found himself in another world... the world of an eroge, famous for its goofy setting. In this game, the heroines always have some parts completely exposed, whether it be their breasts, their lower bodies, or wearing thongs - a veritable paradise! 

What's more, Satoru has the skill "Ero Note." When the favorability rating of the person whose name you've written reaches the maximum, it becomes an unstoppable skill that allows him to do whatever he wants with them!

title: Ryuu: Ron
description:
Kyouto, April 1928. Oshikouji Ryu is 17 years old, and is called 'Genius swordman, Dragon of Kyouto'. He will inherit the property of the noble Oshikouji family, but prefers practising Kendou. He enters a school for training Kendou swordman, but the seniors of school are very harsh and intolerable. But Ryu doesn't surrender and overcomes the problems, later on he impresses his seniors and they begin to like him.

This manga tells a great story against the richly textured background of historical Japan and China, it has a refined and excellent artwork. Murakami's views on Chinese and Korean people is very warm, and not those of the previous invader and governor such as the extreme right party in Japan. Another interesting part of the manga is its rich depiction of Japanese colorful life. A typical example of the realistic style and a manga of high reputation in Korea and Japan.

title: Kakkou no Iinazuke
description: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!

title: Saint Seiya: Episode G Requiem
description: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title: Sensei, Bokutachi wa Koroshiteimasen.
description:
Is corporal punishment by teachers strictly prohibited under any circumstances!? 

Sakurai, a teacher, witnesses bullying in her class and unintentionally raises her hand against the main culprit student, unaware that a disastrous future awaits them because of their resentment...

title: Megami Haiboku - Tensei no Varanowa
description: "Prisoners" who committed crimes and ended their lives while possessing powers that surpassed humans. However, the "prisoners", whose strength and beauty are seen by the gods, are revived as "warriors". "Varanova" is a beautiful human warrior who fights on behalf of the gods in the wars caused by the gods.

title: Manyuu Hikenchou: The Anthology Comic
description: A collection of short 4-Koma comics from various artists for Magi-Cu Magazine based off the Manyuu Hikenchou anime and manga

title: Koisuru (Otome) no Tsukurikata
description: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!

title: You Shou Yan
description:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: Ping-Pong Peril
description: Millions in debt, high schooler Taira's only path to redemption is in the world of underground ping pong! "Gimme a flat table, a ball, and a racket, and I'll show you some ping pong!" A shining table and a burning ball. Nobody will keep their sanity when this crazy ping pong battle begins!

title: Mia-ga dorawatda
description:
Five years ago, my first love, Cha Mia, disappeared. Now, she has reappeared before me, completely changed.
An unexpected reunion at the police station… and she turns out to be a freshman at the same university?

The story of two people who thought it was over begins again on campus... or so I thought, but she still insists on letting the past go.

title: Tsuma ga Kanpeki Sugiru no de, Chotto Midashite Ii desu ka?
description: Rikuto, an illustrator, and his wife Natsuki, a civil servant, have been married for a week. Their newlywed life has only just begun. His wife is too perfect in every way, but Rikuto can't forget the way he once saw her in a disheveled state. He wants to see her again in a disheveled state somehow, but he always ends up being defeated!

title: Tensei Shitara Dragon no Tamago datta: Ibara no Dragon Road
description:
**A fantasy isekai adventure about a man who has to restart life…as an egg?!**

In a world full of dangerous monsters, our unnamed protagonist finds himself reborn at the very bottom of the food chain as an immobile, powerless egg. Even just hatching will require leveling up by fighting monsters–the same monsters who’d love to eat him as a snack. But with the help of the mysterious voice in his head, he’s determined to grow into the most powerful creature in the world!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment*

**Note:** When the manga initially began, it used the light novel's “Saikyou Igai Mezasa nee” subtitle, but by the time of Volume 1, it used its own “Ibara no Dragon Road” subtitle.
___
**Character Designer:** [NAJI Yanagida](https://mangadex.org/author/741e1007-4b08-4ce7-981c-b72ba391936e)

title: Part-Time Grim Reaper
description: “I’m from the afterlife.” Lee Do-jin needs money—a lot of it—to cover his younger sibling’s medical bills. With nowhere else to turn, he calls the number on a strange, ominous business card he finds by chance. At the meeting point, he encounters a silver-haired woman shrouded in mystery— a grim reaper, known as a Chasa. She makes him an unbelievable offer: Work as a temp worker for the Underworld. His mission? To stop “Mokdugi,” predators that feast on souls tainted by sin, before they can drag the damned into chaos. Thrust into the supernatural world of death, debt, and spiritual battles, Do-jin must navigate his new double life— balancing his humanity with a job that demands he walk the line between life and death.

title: Youngest Sister-in-Law in a Tragic Reverse Harem
description: One feverish night, 6-year-old Liliana Bercchio suddenly recalls the plot of a tragic reverse harem novel. Unsure if she's been reincarnated or has time traveled, her young mind struggles to make sense of it all. Her family is doomed to get caught up in the protagonists' mess—but there's still time… or so she thought. When she witnesses the female lead's death and the deranged male leads appear before her sisters, the story takes a turn. They seem different now, but is her family truly safe?

title: Hikotei's Legend of Zelda Body Swap Twitter Comics
Rosario to Vampire Season II
description:
The story continues where the first season left off only months into the future. Yuokai Gakuen has been repaired and the new semester is underway. Tsukune and gang are back, and more powerful then ever. Anti-Thesis's true identity is relieved. With new adversaries looming on the horizon, and something much more sinister then the gang has ever faced before.   
  
Tsukune is battling with the monster inside him. With the help of Moka, Mizore, Kurumu, Ruby, and Yukari. Tsukune trains to get his vampire blood under control and the strength to protect what he holds dear.  
  
The new season focuses more on the girls, their past, and their families. New confrontations await them. New friends and allies will join them by their side. Together they will discover the secrets of Moka's rosary, and her lineage…  
  


---

title: Yachiru-san wa Homeru to Nobiru
description:
Yachiru is a hasshakusama youkai living in the human world. Because the prevailing public image of hasshakusama is that they're lewd, her powers have weakened and her height has shrunk from its original 8 shaku (240 cm) to about 190 cm. She strives to correct that impression, but each day is another failure. However, while at the cinema to study horror films, she meets Seiichirou, a young man who is a huge fan of hasshakusama. That's when Yachiru realizes that whenever Seiichirou praises her, her height returns to its original size...!!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raws:**
  - [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02927/episode/420064)
  - [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/73100)
  - [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%82%84%E3%81%A1%E3%82%8B%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E3%81%BB%E3%82%81%E3%82%8B%E3%81%A8%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B3%E3%82%8B)
- [Official X](https://x.com/yachirusanha)

title: All-Master Necromancer
description:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!

title: Datenshi Sopurano-chan no Fukushuu
description: Back in sixth grade, Mirei hurt her best friend Soprano with heartless words after she confessed to her. Five years later, Soprano, now a famous model, transfers to Mirei's high school. While Mirei hopes to reconcile with Soprano and go back to being friends with her, friendship isn't what's on Soprano's mind.

title: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso o Tsuku
description: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!

title: Aiken ga Ningen ni Naru Hanashi
description: A story about a girl whose pet dog suddenly becomes a cute human girl. What happens when a dog's love for her owner is translated into human form? Will her dog learn good or bad things from humanity?

title: Goddess of Abundance and the Genius Rogue Apostle
description:
I beat the 0.0000001% odds and became an Apostle of the God of Abundance.

Sounds like a farming god, right? …So why is my starter skill Decapitation?

Chop off a head — boom, farming done.
Process crops — boom, processed.

It’s great… but how do I even explain this?

title: Watashi Datte Seishun Shitai Desu yo, Hontou wa.
description:
Otobe Yukari: Avid reader, but average in anything else. A self-proclaimed “background character” who prefers to keep to herself – especially when it comes to Fujimi Shouko, fellow classmate and center of attention.

That all comes apart when Yukari ends up in the Gardening Committee with her, and falls head over heels after their first interaction.

Now lovestruck, Yukari yearns for any chance to get closer to Shouko – a wish that’s immediately granted, after she stumbles in on her weeping from a broken heart…

Follow the daily troubles of a gullible introvert and her shining protagonist!

title: Watashi wo Tabetai, Hitodenashi
description: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam UC (Unicorn) - Bande Dessinée
description:
The year is Universal Century 0096, and Banagher Links is a student at the Anaheim Electronics Industrial College training facility at an incomplete space colony. There, he rescues a girl named Audrey Burne and helps her to evade capture by Zeon remnants known as the Sleeves. The Sleeves are after "Laplace's Box" an item the Vist Foundation has had in its possession since the beginning of the Universal Century which can be used to topple the Earth Federation government, and Cardeas Vist, the head of the family plans to hand them the key to it. Audrey, fearful of what will happen, wants to convince Vist not to give them the key. The Earth Federation's Londo Bell unit attacks the Sleeves and Banagher is drawn into the chaos.  
  
**Notes**:  
Adapted from the light novel series that were later adapted into a feature film series.  
* Day of the Unicorn: Chapters 1-12
* Red Comet: Chapters 13-21
* Palau Capture Battle: Chapters 22-26
* Ghost of Laplace: Chapters 27-29
* In the Depths of a Gravity Well: Chapters 30-38
* The Black Unicorn: Chapters 39-51
* The Sky and the Stars: Chapters 52-60
* Over the Rainbow: Chapters 61-62



---

**Links:**  
- [Original Novels (on Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B07YZTJ135)

title: Itsuka Fukushuu Suru Sono Tame ni
Strange Lessons by Professor Terror
description: University professor Tim Lorentz leads a unique seminar for new students on terrorism and cults. The terrifying lesson begins... What is terrorism really? What are the hidden roots of terrorism in everyday life? All the theories about terrorism that have been spread in the media so far are lies. Professor Terror teaches us the truth about "terrorism and cults," which is scary to know, but even scarier not to know.

title: 335km
description: A girl whose wish is to see the ocean.  A boy who is afraid of the outside. A school trip that was canceled and a journey to fulfill her wish.

title: Momose Akira no Hatsukoi Hatan-chuu.
description: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.

title: Eleceed
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

title: Hachigatsu Kokonoka Boku wa Kimi ni Kuwareru.
description:
In order to eat me, my enigmatic stalker is protecting me from other strange women―  
  
A high school boy, Sakurai, has a secret he cannot tell anyone: he has been plagued by stalkers since he was a child. One day, his classmate, Ueda, suddenly transforms into a monster, revealed to be one of his stalkers. Miyako, who has always been closely following him, appears and saves him. She tells Sakurai that the monsters, commonly known as urban legends in Japan, are after him because they love him. What will be the fate of Sakurai who is loved by countless creatures disguised as beautiful girls?

title: Make Heroine wo Katasetai!!
description: From losing heroine to winning heroine! A pure-hearted heroine guided by a background character protagonist in this cheering rom-com!

title: Houkago, Bokura wa Uchuu ni Madou
description:
"This love shot up like a rocket."

Kinoshima Rocketry Club casually uploaded a test vlog of a test firing of their hybrid engine. The engine exploded — carrying away the dreams of reaching space with it — but that wasn't the only thing that exploded in that vlog. Madoi Ayame, from the engine section, who just so happened to appear in the vlog, also exploded in popularity when viewers from across the world found her cute. While she finds this bewildering, she actually has someone she wished found her cute...

title: Isekai de Te ni Ireta Seisan Skill wa Saikyou datta You desu ~Souzou & Kiyou no W Chiuto de Musou Suru~
description: 29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world. He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.

title: Houkago Kitaku Biyori
description: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.

title: The Ravages of Time
description:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

title: Blue Lock Legions
description:
Rai Genji always dreamed of becoming a world-class professional football player, especially one to play for the Japanese team. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai learns time and time again that he needs to learn and improve beyond anything he thought was possible to survive. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he be doomed by the very people he stands with?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock spin-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

Blue Lock Legions stands independently from the original Blue Lock Manga, and is posted on Mangadex without any involvement in the websites views, beliefs, practices, or problematic norms. It is simply here as the website provides a proper layout for the series to be viewed.

title: Dungeon Odyssey
description:
When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called "dungeon babies," those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. 

Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. 

But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forever...

title: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild wo Yameraremasen~
description: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...!! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now?

title: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ni Watashi wa Naru!
description: In middle school, friendless otaku Arimoto Airi had a revelation after reading (legally distinct) *Gals Can't Be Kind to Otaku*. If she turned herself into a gal, wouldn't she be able to make a ton of friends? Now in high school, her plan is about to come to fruition.

title: Chiseigaku Boys ~Koku ga Salaryman ni natte Hataraku Kaisha~
description: Geopolitics is a hot topic of study that looks at a country's politics and economy from the aspect of geography. Japan is a country with a lot of boys from the U.S., China, Russia, and other countries who work too hard for their own good, and who are in the dark.

title: Nán Fēng Lái Shí Wú Yǔ Tiān
description: Lin Nan is a newly hired Chinese teacher at Jie Lao High School. Timid by nature, she came alone to Jie Lao City to prove to her family that she could live well even without their care. But not long after arriving, she became entangled in a murder case! What will Lin Nan do?

title: Ryoushin no Shakkin o Katagawari Shite Morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu Koto deshita.
description:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
"Why did that happen?!"

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"

title: Jeonjijeok Dokja Sijeom
description: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
description: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!

title: Oni Joushi Gokudera-san wa Abakaretai
description:
A lewd body, with lewd underwear... 
It’s insanely arousing. 

Even though he’s capable, Shouji is a corporate slave, who is always being berated by his boss, Gokudera-san.
In an unexpected turn of events, Gokudera-san accidentally sends him the link of a sexy man wearing women’s underwear instead of his dog’s social media account...
This can't be...?!?!
The gap between the boss who is devilish by day, and erotic and cute by night is enough to make a corporate dog explode in desire!!!

title: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru
description: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...

title: Houkago Play
description:
In the Houkago Play Series:  
  
V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend.  
V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend.  
V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles.  
V.4: R  
V.5: High Heels  
V.6: Maniax  
V.7: High Heels 2  
V.8: High Heels 3

title: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
description:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)

title: Dagaol Jongmal e Kiss
description: Due to an unknown phenomenon, no boys are being born, plunging humanity into an existential crisis. As male trafficking becomes rampant and governments establish shelters to preserve the remaining males, society struggles to adapt.  In this chaotic world, Jessica, a popular actress with a glamorous image, is sponsored by Valentine, the boss of a human trafficking cartel. Her seemingly perfect life takes a dramatic turn when a young man named Jin, claiming to be her long-lost brother, suddenly appears, unraveling secrets and shaking the foundation of her carefully constructed world…

title: Put it All in the Ring!
description:
Friendship. Effort. Victory!

The story centers around the life of a young boxer named Ryuji Takane and his sister Kiku, who is his coach. Ryuji and his sister both inherited their father's talent for boxing with Ryuji inheriting his strength and techniques while Kiku picked up his talent for analysis and strategy. In the past, their father was a famous boxer. Ryuji and Kiku went away from home to train and become famous in order to help their lonely mother. On the way to stardom, they have to defeat the strongest challengers all over the world.

The work that solidified the themes of Weekly Shonen Jump. Those themes being Friendship, Effort, and Victory!

title: Code Geass: Pure Almaria
description:
The fourth year of the Kowa era.

Some time has passed since the last Emperor of the Holy Britannian Empire, Lelouch vi Britannia, was defeated by the unrivaled hero Zero.

The world, which has had a long history of conflict and hatred, has moved towards the future, hand in hand, with dialogue instead of force, with compassion instead of hatred, since the death of the evil Emperor Lelouch, who plotted to conquer the world.

There have been small-scale incidents such as the kidnapping of Zero and Nunnally a few years ago known as the "Confusion in Hashvess", but these were quickly resolved by the Black Knights and Glinda Knights, under the direction of the United Federation of Nations.

Yes. The world has changed. It has been reborn into a world where peace is the norm, and not conflict.

However...

Even though the world has been reborn into peace, conflict has not been eradicated.

There are those who cannot live without conflict, those who want to gain wealth through conflict, and those who want conflict in the first place.

As long as people live and society is formed by people, conflict will never completely disappear. The unrest happening here in Krygyzstan was one of them.

title: Hiyoku no Tori
description:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that they’re so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.  
  
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.  
  
If you’re here for a human x harpy relationship… Well, let’s just say you won’t be disappointed either.

title: Fushigi Yuugi - Byakko Senki
description:
From Nyan-Nyan Rampage:  
  
"The final arc of the story begins…  
  
When Takao Osugi receives the mysterious "Universe of the Four Gods" book from his mentor, Einosuke Okuda, he does everything to keep it away from his young daughter, Suzuno. But when disaster strikes Tokyo, can he still protect her from her fate?  
  
Shortly after the tragic finale of Genbu Kaiden, young Suzuno Osugi's tale as the Priestess of Byakko beings to unfold!"

title: Zense wa Reikoku Koutei, Konse wa Youjo
description:
"Juliana, your fiancé has been decided.”
At that moment, the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule. 

Now, reborn as a delicate young noble girl, Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption, poverty, and disease, all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor, Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time, with her tiny hands. 

A dark yet thrilling tale of power, justice, and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!

title: Fatale Game
description:
A story about the relationship between Tainaka Seri, a mid-career manga artist who has only had one successful work, and her new editor Futami Sumire. When her editor, who has been with her for 10 years since her debut, decides to transfer, Seri is introduced to her new editor Sumire. Sumire says she is a fan of Seri's, and while Seri is surprised by her unique way of closing the distance, she is somehow fascinated by her...

(Source: Natalie, translated)

title: Jipguseok Jeoldaeja
description: Kill monsters, save your neighbors, and expand your domain, all from the comfort of your couch. When his city becomes infested with monsters, Jaehyeon discovers an ability that makes him the absolute master of his apartment building. But his ability comes with a catch -- he cannot leave his apartment. Now, he must arm his neighbors and lead them beyond their building to survive the post-apocalyptic world they find themselves in.

title: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...
description: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her "slave" status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

title: Megami no Café Terrace
description:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)

title: Eroge Sekai ni Tensei Shita Ore ga, Oshi e no Ai de Netorare Heroine wo Shiawase ni Suru.
description:
"Suck it nicely, you weakling!"

The one servicing that bastard's thing was my beloved girlfriend. There was nothing I could do before that scene...

After starting to play an erotic game recommended by a friend, Mitsuki falls head over heels in love with the game's main heroine, Kotoha. But this game is a NTR game in which the heroine is seduced by the player's best friend, Ryou?! While searching for a happy ending with Kotoha, Mitsuki accidentally falls onto the train platform. When he wakes up, he finds himself faced with none other than… Kotoha!? To his surprise, Mitsuki has been reincarnated as the player character of "that" game…!

With his vast knowledge and love of games, Mitsuki is determined to change fate this time. In order to protect Kotoha and the others from Ryou, he must achieve a perfect happy ending!
___
**Additional Official Raws:**
- Individual Chapters: [comipo](https://comipo.app/series/web/20610/), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CTHPS4K3), [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/811406/)
- Volumes: [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/comic/work/=/product_id/BJ01208710.html)

title: Yeokdaegeum Yeongji Seolgyesa
description:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?

title: Mujikbaeksu Gye Baek-sun
description: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

title: Bad Guy
description: For 10 years I tried to be a good person for her, whom she could love. But then I found out that she did not notice my feelings and fell in love with a bad guy! So from today, I decided to become bad.

title: Dig It
description:
As the son of retired Japanese national team ace Shishiya Kei, Shishiya Gaku was the ace of his middle school club team, but he wondered if he was suited to be an attacker.
One day, Kei came to watch Gaku practice and met Noboru, who had exceptional talent as an attacker, and declared that he would make him the best volleyball player in Japan. The father-son relationship ended. Gaku vowed to prove his own limits as an attacker and beat his father and Noboru with the volleyball style he had pioneered.

title: Shino-chan Can't Say Her Name
description: "I can't say my own name," says Ooshima Shino. When she enters high school, she makes her first friend. Communication full of nothing but awkwardness begins. Suitable words always come to mind after some delay. But adolescence can turn even a klutz into a star… right?

title: Sora Tobu Violin
description:
Yoshida Yoshio, a boy who has been playing the violin since he was a child in order to live up to his parents' expectations. He feels burdened by this situation and is unable to fit in at his new school, leading a lonely life. One day, Yoshio spots a girl he has never seen before, Amano Tessera, in his classroom. Suspicious of her existence, Yoshio chases after Tessera, but...

(Source: Natalie, translated)

title: Hitodzuma Kyoushi ga Oshiego no Joshi koukousei ni do hamari suru Hanashi
description:
Itsuki Ichigohara is a married high-school teacher in her late 20's, who finds herself involved with a high school girl, her student, who is 10 years younger. The student's name is Rin Togawa. She is taller than Itsuki, with a beautiful face, mild-mannered but a little childish. She is a good girl, but she has had problems in her family life, and as Itsuki tried to counsel her, they somehow ended up kissing each other in bed. This is definitely an adulterous betrayal, not to mention a crime. How could she have got herself into so much trouble that could only lead to her own destruction?

— How could I have let this happen?

It is a lewd and immoral, but somehow warm relationship. A love story between a female teacher and her female student.

title: Solo Leveling: Ragnarok
description: After witnessing the death of one of their own, the Absolute Ones — creators of the many universes outside of our own — frantically seek to fill the power void left by their fallen brother. With earth's existence in danger once more as gates spill monsters into our dimension, Sung Suho must answer the call and conquer the shadow dungeon while learning of his father's legendary legacy.

title: Chainsaw Man
description:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

title: Adachi to Shimamura
description: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.

title: I'm the Max-Level Newbie
description:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: Silver Mountain
description: A boy said to have been taken by a tengu to the "Enchanted Realm". From his mouth pours the tale of an unbelievable world made real—those who yearn for it race toward the pinnacle of "martial prowess".

title: GraPara!
description:
Shinobu Sumida, a down-on-his-luck gravure otaku, unexpectedly starts living together with rookie gravure idol Sakura Katsuragi! But his heart-racing dream days are short-lived as lecherous photographers, crooked managers, and sexually harassing producers start closing in on his “beloved Sakura-chan” one after another!! Can Shinobu protect Sakura-chan's virtue!? 

From the creator of the hit series “Karamizakari” (over 4.5 million copies sold), Airi Katsura presents this NTR romantic comedy featuring popular gravure idols♡

title: Flame of Recca
description: Becoming a ninja is just a childhood dream for sixteen-year-old Recca, until a fateful encounter reveals he has inherited ninja powers, including the ability to wield fire! As Recca learns to master the ancient ways of his ancestors, he is drawn to protect a mysterious girl named Yanagi…

title: The King's Avatar
description:
No one could ever come close to “Battle God” Ye Qiu’s skills in Glory, a popular game that took the world by storm. His professional team, however, replaced him with another captain, and even seized his account.

He was left to start anew at an internet café as a manager. When a new District 10 opened up in Glory, he dives back, armed with a decade of experience and an unfinished custom weapon.

His path to redemption, filled with strategy and memories, marks his thrilling return to the summit.

---

***Note:*** This is a webcomic rerun of [The King's Avatar](https://mangadex.org/title/83d08adf-6118-4859-a0e7-082f3707604b).

Alternative Official English Translation: [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/the-king's-avatar_17959825305729101)

title: Mayonaka Heart Tune
description:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)

title: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan no Inu
description: In the Special Operations Group, an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force, there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. One day, at the behest of her superior, she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as “Beppan”. Given the name “Nana”, she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.

title: Apocalypse Zero
description: A series of natural disasters has reduced the world to rubble, with the survivors doing whatever they must to survive in a world gone mad. But one young boy, Kakugo, gifted with amazing martial arts and a superpowerful suit of armor by his late father, has been charged with making the world (or at least his school) a safer place. But his brother has a matching set of skills and equipment, and he's on a mission to bring peace to the world… by wiping out humanity!

title: Gwijjal Romance
description: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

title: Blue Lock
description:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.
___
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Nankai Soujou-hen
description:
Spring is here, and the graduating seniors of First High are planning a getaway to sunny Okinawa. At the same time, Tatsuya and Miyuki will be on the island as the Yotsuba family’s representatives at a memorial service for the victims of the invasion there several years earlier. Of course, this is just a cover for their true purpose: foiling a terrorist plot hatched by some deserters and Australian operatives. Their primary target is a party that Shizuku and Honoka will be attending—What are the chances? Romance is in the air, and danger is on the horizon, making this a vacation they’ll never forget!

Manga adaption of the 'Southern Sea Riot Arc' from the 20th light novel.

title: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.
description: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...

title: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei
description:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!
___
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)

title: Konbini de Deatta Eroi Onnanoko to Tadare Kitta Kankei ni Narimashita
description:
"Onii-san, it seems like you come to this store a lot, don't you?"

Tomoya's nightly visits to his local conbini aren't for snacks. He's there for the girl who shows up every night. When they finally talk, it quickly becomes clear that she's looking for some fun… ADULT fun.

A hot and erotic story that starts in a conbini.

title: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
description: When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.

title: Shihai Shoujo Kubaru-chan
description:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.

title: Grand Metal Organs
description: A boy killed by his superhero idol, then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"

title: Senki Survival Saga -Isekai no Unmei o Kaketa Mujintou Fujun Iseikouyuu-
description: Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic…!?

title: Ochaocha ~Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto~
description:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)

title: Bang Bang Dream Dream
description:
Developing various media mixes Next generation girls band project a>The forbidden 1st comic of "Banban Ridori", which caused a huge response when it started serializing in CoroCoro Aniki, is finally released!! Kasumi tries a hot water bath! Arisaki and Tae are relatively safe! Saaya defeats enemies with blood! Saaya grows in gacha! Saaya has an abnormally small face! Rimi becomes a beast in search of chocolate coronet! Kasumi with sparkling withdrawal symptoms! Saaya is fired! Rimi is parasitic on me! This is a big deal!!
“BanG Dream!” feat. Nyaro melon!!

title: Watashi no Hatsukoi wa Hazukashisugite Darenimo Ienai
description:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Fathoms of Atonement
description: Jinshuilang, a mer, tries to atone for his past mistakes that killed his best friend, Huoliu. He was able to save Huoliu's soul for reincarnation. After a century of searching and regretting not having realized his feelings for Huoliu sooner, he finally finds the reincarnation of his best friend, now a human named Wen Honglin. But the price of a second chance may be more than he can bear.

title: Fukushuu wo Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha wa, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru
description:
Raoul, who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero, should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats, he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed, at last, his heart fell into darkness.

"I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering......!!!"

Obtaining the power of darkness, Raoul was revived. Sneering, he vowed revenge. "Oh, I'm looking forward to it – from now on, I'll bask in their blood as I please." Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion, the parade that would advance towards tragedy began.
___
**Storyboarder:** [Hanji](https://mangadex.org/author/ce336432-7da7-45a0-bcdd-523cc0e5c3e5)
**Character Designer:** [Araya](https://mangadex.org/author/01944b4f-2580-447d-9e18-9b1eac224beb)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39335)

title: Toukyou Ghoul:re
description:
Two years have passed since the CCG's raid on Anteiku. Although the atmosphere in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the increased influence of the CCG, ghouls continue to pose a problem as they have begun taking caution, especially the terrorist organization Aogiri Tree, who acknowledge the CCG's growing threat to their existence.  
  
The creation of a special team, known as the Quinx Squad, may provide the CCG with the push they need to exterminate Tokyo's unwanted residents. As humans who have undergone surgery in order to make use of the special abilities of ghouls, they participate in operations to eradicate the dangerous creatures. The leader of this group, Haise Sasaki, is a half-ghoul, half-human who has been trained by famed special class investigator, Kishou Arima. However, there's more to this young man than meets the eye, as unknown memories claw at his mind, slowly reminding him of the person he used to be.  


---

title: Chrono Monochrome
description: Inubuse Kuromu aspired to be King in Chess, he was so skilled he represented Japan in the World Youth Chess Championship at age 11. However, due to his loss to a mysterious, wolf-like player, he developed a condition where he can't sit in front of anyone?! Because of this condition, he stopped playing Chess and chose to solely focus on his studies until his fingers break. Three years since his loss, while desperately still holding onto his title as 'King' through internet Chess, he meets an incredibly strong opponent. This game…starts his tale to become King.

title: Rekkyou Sensen
description: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!

title: Nine Peaks
description:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**

title: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?

title: Tonari no Gyaru wa Kuchisabishii-chan
description:
The Gyaru sitting next to me is always sucking on a candy (or lollipop). She makes a "lero-lero" sound with her long tongue, as if she's trying to provoke me!

Any healthy boy going through puberty would look at that with a perverted eye, right?! Don't look... Don't look, me! If she finds out I'm looking at her in a lewd way, my school life is over...!!

title: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken
description: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an "angel." Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she's also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm.

title: My Food Looks Very Cute
description: For nearly two centuries, the vampire Maria slumbered in her coffin — until Xing Lan (星阑), a wandering werewolf girl, happened upon her resting place and awakened her. As Xing Lan opened the coffin, a curse sealed itself upon her, leaving her none the wiser. The naïve but spirited wolf girl cheerfully embraced her newfound companion. Together, they embarked on a journey to the city...

title: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu
description:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Note: 
Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)

title: Rakujitsu no Pathos
description:
What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?

Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls...

title: The Crushing Weight Of This Universe
description:
What will you do to get what you want?

[Updates monthly (usually).]

title: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
description:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam, Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Mexico, and Brazil only.

title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Iga no Monogatari
description: A prequel manga to the Assassin's Creed Shadows game, it tells the story of Tsuyu, Nagato, and Hanzo, how they met, and their lives before their lives changed completely.

title: Yowa Yowa Sensei
description: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality!

title: Dragon Ball - Zeroverse (Doujinshi)
description:
A few years have passed since Goku first met Uub, he's become satisfied that Uub is becoming stronger while he trains him so decides to take him to the next Tenkaichi Budokai tournament in order to test him.  
  
In the background, a mysterious adversary from a different universe, Universe 0 (This was long before Dragon Ball Super) wants to return to our universe. In order to achieve that task, he requires the power of the Dragon Balls, and has revived Babidi in order to accomplish that goal.  
  
Babidi soon awakens the remnants of Majin Buu sleeping deep within Uub and turns him into his puppet. Now it's up to Goku and Co. to stop this new adversary from crossing over into their universe at all costs!

title: Repeat Vice ~Akuyaku Kizoku wa Shinitakunai node Shiten Nou ni Naru no wo Yamemashita~
description:
The arrogant noble Rufus is furious. Why? Because in a world where a popular RPG has come to life, he keeps dying miserably over and over again as a pathetic villainous noble. Such a disgraceful end is unworthy of a proud aristocrat. He may only be twelve years old, but age doesn't matter. He is determined to do whatever it takes to avoid his tragic fate.

He takes down the corrupt official who started it all, eases the heavy taxes on his people, and continues to slay the monsters that ravage his domain. As he does, a hidden power that never appeared in the game begins to awaken. For some reason, the commoners begin to praise him, but he declares, "Don't misunderstand me, commoners. I’m doing this for myself."

title: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child
description: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

title: Familyman
description: While Gang-ho was working at the local factory, he slept only three hours a day and worked like a horse. However, after his face was burned with the fire, he was dismissed from his workplace. He now does not want his daughter to be scared of his face, so he decided to wear the costume of SUPERHERO, “Guru-man”, and stay with her.

title: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita - Highelf with a Long Life
description:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle.
