So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that's more his pace.
___
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

title: Noa-senpai wa Tomodachi.
description:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.
___
**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)

title: Dangerous Lover
description:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

title: Choujin X
description:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/choujin-x)

title: 'Tis Time for "Torture," Princess
description: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!

title: Hazure Skill "Soine" ga Kakuseishi, Boku ga Saikyou Harem wo Kizuku made ~Micchaku Soine de Ganbou Kaihou!? Yuuwakusare Makutte Komattemasu!!~
description: Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student. This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.

title: Chaika: The Coffin Princess
description:
Toru Acura, an incredibly lazy man with some hidden talents, has been forced by his sister Akari to actually go outside and search for work. However, he is in for a big surprise when he meets Chaika Trabant in the forest, and they are suddenly attacked by a monster! How will they survive? Who is this mysterious girl, and why is she being targeted?  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Sakaki Ichirou with illustrations by Namaniku ATK.

title: Hajirau Kimi ga Mitainda
description: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.

title: Anna Komnene
description: "I will become emperor and bring peace to the world!" A vivid depiction of the life of the Byzantine princess Anna Comnena, the only known female historian of the Western Middle Ages!

title: Let's Play
description:
Sam wants to be a game developer, but before her career can get started, a popular gaming personality posts a video of himself playing her first game and gives it a bad review. To make matters worse, she soon finds out he's her new neighbor! A story about gaming, memes, and social anxiety. Come for the plot, stay for the doggo.

---
Alt. Official English: [Webtoons (expired)](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/letsplay/list?title_no=1218)

title: Ningyou Touge
description: A group of high school students visit the inside of a mountain on an agricultural trip. While staying at a farmer's home, they learn the rural life. However, the village doesn't exist…? A shudder runs down everyone's spine as a lot of inexplicable events happen in the village, that now restricts entry. What are the high schoolers' fate?

title: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it
description: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

title: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!
description:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?

title: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!
description:
Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!

---
**Link:** Defunct Official English - [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc329?utm_source=mgd)

title: Nante Nasakenai Bokura da
description: A new idol on the rise, Souda Natsumi and her friend from highschool Iiyama Yukiya meet again at a music store. What lies at the end of this unwanted encounter?!

title: Raika Days
description: 4-Koma comedy following the super genius grade school student Haruna Raika and her every day life. Where she's the class president, the room leader, the top student, and even fills in for the teacher when they've overslept!

title: Hachinan tte, Sore wa Nai deshou!
description:
Ichinomiya Shingo, a young 25 years old, single, company worker, while thinking of tomorrow’s busy working day goes to sleep. However, the when he wakes up, it was a room unknown to him.

He learns that he is inside a 6 years-old boy and has taken over his mind. Furthermore, he learns a lot from the memories of said boy: he was born as the youngest child (8th son and 10th child) of a poor noble family living in the back country. Having no administrative skill, he couldn’t do anything to manage the vast land his family has. Fortunately, he was blessed with a very rare talent, talent of magic. Unfortunately, while his talent could bring prosperity to his family, in his situation it only brought disaster.

Yes, this is the story of the boy, Wendelin von Benno Baumeister, opening his own path in a harsh world.

title: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)
description: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.

title: Kurotsuki no Yaergnacht
description:
While on his way home from an interview, unemployed, unmotivated, jaded 18-year-old Inumata Shinogi encounters the beautiful lady and evil spirit Yaergnacht Finsternis. She demands him to either marry her or die on the spot. He must command the battle against enemies of humanity, the apostles of God (Highlanders), and save the world with his wife!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912965944469925)

title: Chronicles of the Reincarnated Demon God
description:
The Young Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woonhwi, attained the position of cult heir in the Heavenly Demon Cult with only supernatural abilities. His life of chaos finally meets its end during the rebellion of the vice cult leader and the elders. 

[Even if you needed to kill me, you should have remembered what kind of man I am. So, all of you, die!] 

After dying together with all the traitors, he wakes up in a place he could never have imagined. 

[A branch of the Tang Clan?] 

Tang Woonhwi of the Sichuan Tang Clan's Nine Dragon Branch Family now dreams of rebuilding the Heavenly Demon Cult!

title: Choudokyuu Cheat Akuyaku Reijou no Karei Naru Fukushuutan
description:
The protagonist awakens to find herself reincarnated as Lunaria il von Solfege, her beloved villainess from her favorite game. However, along with this new identity come Lunaria's tragic memories—public condemnation, complete abandonment, and ultimately, a desperate attempt to take her own life with a dagger. "You can leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I am you, I will never let them get away with this," she vows.

*Source: K Manga*

title: The Swordmaster's Son
description:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Dark Gathering
description: Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.

title: Doomsia's Healing Sessions
description: A devoted cleric's journey alongside a Draganonian warrior who suffers under an ancient curse of Lust.

title: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World
description:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he'll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
___
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)

title: Subtle Disaster
description: A webtoon writer, Songshin Ha, lives in the apartment, at the top of the hill, that has serious problem with neighbor's noise; and he desperately wants to solve the problem with his neighbors.

title: Perfect Glitter
description: Momo spends her days posting pictures on social media and survives on the few "likes" she gets. One day, she suddenly receives an invitation to meet up with her idol, Ichika, an influencer. Momo is overjoyed by the unexpected good news, but what awaits her ahead? Is it heaven or a one-way ticket to hell?

title: INNU - Girl Meets Dog
description:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)

title: HUNTER x HUNTER (Official Colored)
description: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.

title: Tengoku Daimakyou
description: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!

title: Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou-shu no Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau
description: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.

title: Ojousama no Shimobe
description: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.

title: DINKs no Totsukitoka "Umanai Onna " wa Damedesu ka?
Double Play
description: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed... Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.

title: Sirens Won't Sing For You
description:
Towa Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Towa musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret...?

(Source: MANGA Plus)

title: Onii-chan wa Oshimai!
description:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)

title: Game Chishiki de Saikyou ni Natta Mob Heishi wa, Shin no Jitsuryoku wo Kakushitai
description: One day, Sylva realized that he reincarnated into a mob soldier from the game that he was hooked on in his previous life. Even though he utilizes his game knowledge to do his utmost best to survive in this dangerous world, he opts to hide his true strength in order not to throw the scenario into disarray. However, an unexpected turn of events led him to easily defeat a powerful demon that even the hero is hard-pressed to defeat. And to make matters worse, he did that in front of his favorite heroine in the game... Upon this incident, word started getting out about his true strength...!

title: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Haru Urara Ganbaru!
description:
A comedy series based off the real life story of Haru Urara.

Source: AniList

title: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All
description:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***

title: Daily Chaldea
description:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title: Game Chuuban de Shinu Akuyaku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita node, Hazure Skill "Tame" wo Kushi Shite Saikyou wo Mezashite Mita
description: One day, the protagonist was reincarnated as Lest Albion, a villainous aristocrat from the popular romance action RPG "Symphonia of Swords and Magic"! Although he is destined to be defeated midway through the game, he develops the hidden power of the skill "Tame" and grows at an astonishing speed. Eventually, he gains powers that surpass even the final boss, and as he rewrites his fate, the main heroines start to gather around him for some reason!

title: Ane no Tomodachi
description:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?
___
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**

title: To Love Ru Darkness (Official Colored)
description: Momo is the younger sister of Lala, the alien princess who has long since been engaged to the human Rito. Although Rito’s heart continues to waver between Lala and his first crush, Haruna, Momo finds herself unable to deny the feelings she has for the hapless human male. Instead of giving up, Momo attempts to surround Rito with a harem of beautiful women, all working towards urging him to marry Lala, become crowned as King, and as a result, be allowed to marry his entire harem—Momo included!

title: BOX - Something's in the Box
description:
Seven people received a "puzzle" and ticket from an unknown sender, and followed the ticket to a strange square house. A mysterious woman who came "out of curiosity" joined them, and what awaited those people in the house was a girl as beautiful as a doll and maze beyond imagination. They cannot leave unless they solve the puzzle. When it's solved, part of your body will disappear! Can they escape? And, just who invited them there?

From [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/113065/Box-Hako-no-Naka-ni-Nanika-Iru/)

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Ichijou Masaki Tenkou-hen
description:
A terrorist bombing strikes the Ten Master Clans Conference. In order to investigate the incident, Ichijou Masaki, the eldest son of the Ichijou family, one of the Ten Master Clans, known as the Crimson Prince, temporarily transfers from Third High School to First High School. This also means becoming classmates with the goddess he admires, Shiba Miyuki.

A spin off from the main story of Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei Shizoku Kaigi-hen

title: Houseki no Kuni (Minimalist Color)
description: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

title: Traceless Knight
description: Hiding his extraordinary magical potential, young Fabian Trevin leads a quiet life in his family's vineyard, sheltered from the scrutiny of noble society under his strict father's watchful eye. But before his tenth summer, the arrival of Lady Knight Iliora Rozene shatters his peaceful existence, setting his fate on an irreversible course.

title: Kinenbi Manga
description: A manga about celebrating all the different holidays a year has.

title: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!
description: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!

title: Digimon Liberator
description:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.

title: 7-Nin no Nemuri Hime
description: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?

title: Yuukoku no Moriarty: The Remains
description: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.

title: Princess Princess
description:
Why is Toru Kouno receiving such an overly warm welcome at his new all boy's school? He has yet to discover the secret system called "Hime (Princess)" in effect at the school. Boys who are chosen have to dress up as a girl in every school event! Little does Kouno know that he would be the chosen one…  
–  
Contains the story Tore x Puri (Train x Princess) in volume three.

title: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru
description: Kiska, a boy who was mistreated by the villagers, was able to get by thanks to his childhood friend, Namia, who was the only one who stood by him. One day, Namia is found murdered in the village. Kiska is framed for the murder by the other villagers, and banished to an inescapable S-class dungeon...?

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)
description: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.

title: Inkya no Ore ga Sekigae de S-kyuu Bishoujo ni Kakomaretara Himitsu no Kankei ga Hajimatta.
description:
My peaceful school life... is officially over.

Izumiya Ryouta, an introverted otaku, suddenly finds himself surrounded by the top three beauties of the class after a seat change. In front of him sits the little-sister-type Miyama Airi. To his left, the cool and detached gyaru, Ichinose Yuria. And to his right, the refined, black-haired class rep, Kuroki Ruri. On the surface, they're flawless beauties—but Ryouta stumbles upon secrets that none of them can ever let out...

"P-Please...! Just don’t tell anyone about this!"
"From now on, we're in that kind of relationship."
"This is a secret... just between you and me, Ryouta-kun."

All he wanted was a quiet otaku life—so how did things end up like this?!

title: Yuusha-kun wa Tabidatenai
description: The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!! And now its time to set out!! ...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills... Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?

title: Katabutsu-kei Joshi ni Kokuhaku shitemita
description: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
description: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.

title: This Life's Universal Superstar
description: Hard-pressed to find good luck in this universe, Sun Woojoo gives up on his dream of becoming an idol in favor of living a normal life. That is, until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it, Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it, and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill, will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?

title: Four Choices
description: A perfectionist model student believed love was a luxury. Suddenly, four choices appear and her heart wavers. Is this okay?

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Douran no Joshou-hen
description:
March 2097—Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island…

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.

title: In-kya na Tsubame wa Bocchi JK
description:
A short prequel to [Introvert Tsubame wants to change](https://mangadex.org/title/1007ec9d-af06-4f22-80a7-3934f02d30b7/introvert-tsubame-wants-to-change), depicting her gloomy High School days.

Originally released as a 20-days extra contents for the original series, Grande later published this manga as an independent book.

title: Bleach (Official Colored)
description:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.

---
Links:
* alternative [official raw](https://www.shueisha.co.jp/books/search/search.html?seriesid=48374)

title: Puberty, an All Boys School!? and Nakano-kun
description: Hajime Nakano is forced by his mother to enroll at a newly opened all boys high school, and he laments over having to spend the next three years surrounded by other guys. However, he doesn't know that all of the other students are girls secretly pretending to be guys, and each of them think they are the only girl in the whole school.

title: Love Revolution
description: Romance, such thing cannot exist between us!

title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen
description:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
— If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
— If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.

title: Love Bullet
description:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!

title: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
description:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan/Philippines/Thailand/Vietnam/Hong Kong/Taiwan/India/Mexico, and Brazil only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)

title: Xīnglíng Shénzhǔ
description: The world has changed dramatically, and "dungeon games" have randomly appeared everywhere, and the monsters that appear are bloody killings on humans! The Chuunibyou manga artist Qin You has experienced countless dungeons in his dreams, and knows......

title: Bokutachi ga Yarimashita
description:
We aim for the bowling high score…   
Next week, we watch the TV…   
Our senior friend is rich…  
Yes, our life is full of hope!  
  
 The story centers on a group of friends who are satisfied and complacent with their everyday lives. The friends include Tobio, a passive high schooler who makes it a rule not to hope too much; Maru, a scheming boy who gossips behind people's back; Isami, a gaudy student who likes girls and recently got a girlfriend with big breasts; and their senior Paisen (slang for senpai, or upperclassman), a 20-year old man who is rich and has long graduated from high school.

title: Crows Zero
description:
The story starts with Takiya Genji, the son of a Yakuza boss, entering Suzuran All-Boys High School as a transferred senior with the goal of conquering it. During the Freshers' orientation lecture, Yakuza arrive at the school seeking Tamao Serizawa to avenge an injury.  
  
* Based on the first live action film.

title: Kimi ni Koisuru Sanshimai
description: In the world of daily full-throttle dedication to his studies, there's Itsuki, a high school boy. The reason he's putting in so much effort into his studies is to reunite with his first love, a girl named Amane, and go on a date with her. While he's immersed in these study-centric days, by a twist of fate, he ends up living together with Amane and her sisters, Shion and Mone...!?

title: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite
description: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!

title: Wakeari Shinrei Mansion
description:
Kaoru Shinonome, who had been living as a freelancer, invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants, only spirits, and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents! (Titan Manga)
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/wakearimanshon)

title: Akuyaku Ikka no Okugata, Shi ni Modori shite Kokoro wo Irekaeru
description:
The Duchess of Farrens is a prominent noble family that supports the backbone of the Kingdom of Istoward. Elaine Farrens, the duchess of Farrens, after her misdeeds and attempted usurpation of the country, finally died, her life taken by her own daughter. In her dying moments, her high pride was finally broken, and she truly regretted what she had done, but it was all in vain. The ducal family itself was destroyed, and its notoriety was to be forgotten in time.

However, Elaine regained consciousness the next thing she knew. And what’s more, she was giving birth. She immediately realised that it was useless to try to understand her situation in such a situation, and decided to face the life in front of her, thinking about it after the birth for now.

title: Kon'yaku Haki no Akui wa Shoukan kara Okaeshi Shimasu
description:
"Sharon Ray Fondevole. I'm breaking off my engagement with you right here and now!"

Sharon, a duke's daughter known as the flower of society, is inexplicably told by her fiancé, the crown prince, that her engagement is broken, and then she is kidnapped and sold off to a brothel. Sharon, now resigned, takes control of the brothel with her education and leadership skills, and pursues the truth behind the broken engagement. Sharon then meets Travis, the duke's son, whom she once had feelings for...
___
* **Original Web Publication:** [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00202651010000_68/), [Nico Nico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55619)
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8385gp/)

title: Tensei Shita Kuukan Mahoutsukai wa Shoutai Kakushite Medachitai!
description:
"With this power, couldn't I become a mysterious mage who stands out while no one knows who he is?" 

Higashiyama Touri is reincarnated and granted the ultimate talent for a rare and special type of magic, "Dimensional Magic" by God himself. Dreaming of becoming the cool, enigmatic powerhouse whose name spreads through whispered rumors while he enjoys a quiet drink at the bar, Touri decides to act out his fantasy. Right after reincarnating, he rescues an adventurer party from being wiped out by a giant monster. Expecting the girls to spread rumors about him, he is shocked when instead... the country's strongest party, full of beautiful women, starts following him around?!

title: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba Ii?
description: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn't understand how to connect with her.

title: Shitai Katsugi no Nemu
description:
Garen, who became stranded in a dungeon, met Nemu the Corpse Bearer. A Corpse Bearer was someone who went to retrieve the bodies of people who'd died in dangerous places like dungeon depths, beast lairs, or the ocean floor. Answering the pleas of the bereaved who said, "I want them back even if it's just their body," Nemu continued to travel to dangerous places, carrying corpses back home. 

A tale of a dungeon 'body recovery specialist' who walked bearing the regrets of the dead.

title: APOSIMZ
description: The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.

title: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultra God Mission!!!!
description: Continuation of the Super Dragon Ball Heroes manga series and adaptation to the video game of the same name. Goku and Vegeta face new opponents from across parallel timelines and different universes!

title: Boku no Ikezu na Konyakusha
description: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because... "You're very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show?

title: My Name Is Shingo
description:
Two elementary school pupils, a girl named Marine and a boy named Satoru, fall in love and are blessed with a rather unorthodox child which happens to be a robot. This robot is called Shingo and the story recounts how its mind develops and how it travels the world in pursuit of its ‘parents’ whom it has never had a chance to meet.

Note: Volume count based on the bunkoban.

title: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?
description:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title: Jingai Kyoushitsu no Ningengirai Kyoushi: Hitoma-sensei, Watashi-tachi ni Ningen o Oshiete Kuremasu ka……?
description:
These girls aren't human. Still, they adore humans more than anyone. 

I am Hitoma Rei, a NEET nearing 30 years old who was traumatized by  human relationships.  When I changed jobs, I ended up at an all-girls school whose purpose is to take non-humans and make them human!? Spending my days with the strange students Minadzuki Kyouka, a mermaid; Oogami Isaki, a werewolf; Usami Sui, a rabbit; and Haneda Tobari, a bird... 

Why do they want to be human? What do they want to do once they become human? I will teach them about humans. This may be an alternate world, but it's not like I've been reincarnated. This is just the story of a teacher who spends time with some girls who wish to become human, in a slightly odd school.

title: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Star Blossom
description:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.
___
- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)

title: Osananananajimi
description: Momose Yuuichi and Fujino Sumi are childhood friends who have been together since they were little. Now, they're high school classmates, but since they've reached puberty, they don't feel as close as they used to.  They know each other well, but there's a sense of formality there.  This is the delicate relationship between them, until one day, Sumi suddenly comes to Yuuichi's house...?

title: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru ~Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei Shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken~
description:
Middle-aged Beryl Gardinant has only ever accomplished one thing: running a humble sword-fighting dojo in the quiet countryside. 

But when he’s paid a visit by his former pupil, Allusia, he discovers that she has become an elite commander — and she’s hardly the only ex-student who’s a renowned warrior! 

Now forced by Allusia to become a special instructor to the strongest order of knights in the kingdom, can Beryl reach his full potential even though he’s an old man?
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Official English Light Novel:** [J-Novel Club](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)

title: The Long Way of the Warrior
description: In the second half of the 2nd century, Naru, a warrior from the state of Koryo, was sold as a gladiator-slave to the Roman Empire and waged a desperate struggle for freedom.

title: Death Penalty
description:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

title: The Doctor Is Out
description: When the duke, who was in poor condition, suddenly died, the land fell into the hands of the rebels. In a short time, the rebellion was suppressed by the royal family, but… The point is that I, Lise Estelle, will be hanged for treason. “It’s not fair!” I’m simply the best doctor in the area. If that’s the case, I’ll become the duke’s doctor this time so there’s no rebellion, and I’ll make the duke’s heir healthy! “No one cares about you as much as I do. Therefore, you must definitely listen to me !

title: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore
description:
A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel, *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasn't reborn as the protagonist, but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him, he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil".
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66135)

title: Ghost Dating Simulation
description: Struggling streamer **Doyeon Choi** downloads a mysterious dating sim game, ***Heart-Racing Ghost Dating Sim***, only to find himself trapped in a deadly loop-- where the love interests are real-life ghosts with unresolved deaths. From haunted highways to murder cases, **Doyeon** must navigate a world where romance, horror, and mystery collide. Every wrong move could cost him his life...again.

title: Chitose-kun wa Ramune Bin no Naka
description:
"Class 5's Chitose Saku is a fucking playboy!"

Chitose Saku is at the top of the school caste. He and his friends are textbook examples of normies, despised by the less fortunate. Surrounded by girls and boys of every kind, he's chosen to lead his second-year class by his laid-back advisor.
___
- Adaptation of Light Novel - [Anilist](https://anilist.co/manga/121795/Chitosekun-Is-in-the-Ramune-Bottle/)

title: Hyper Warrior Gundam Boy
description: Taiga Amachi, a diehard SD Gundam fan, joins the Gundam Research Group (also commonly known as "G-Group"). He does battle in a Gunpla battle simulator against the many enemies aiming to take down G-Group.

title: Please Take My Brother Away!
description: What's your brother like? To Miao, her brother Fen is someone who teases her and makes her go ballistic 100 times a day. There's rarely a peaceful day as the two are fighting every single minute. However, when trouble comes, Fen becomes a caring brother who protects his little sister at all costs.

title: Kyatapi Land
description: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.

title: Kuchibeta Shokudou
description:
For five years, she's been eating at the set-meal restaurant but didn't feel comfortable saying anything more, and the waitress at the restaurant who wanted to talk to that regular customer but couldn't get the words out. Their feelings are leaking out, but they just couldn't express their love for each other in many ways.
___
- **Note:**
*Kuchibeta Shokudou*, originally released under the title *Otagai Iitai Koto ga Ienai Tenin Okyakusan no Manga* (お互い言いたいことが言えない店員とお客さんの漫画), is a web manga released on the [author's Twitter account](https://twitter.com/i/events/1378283683996528643) since February 15, 2019, and it was picked up for commercial publication on December 10, 2021.

title: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster
description: After dying in a car accident, an office worker finds herself reincarnated as Giselle Rozevin, a villain doomed to be poisoned while awaiting a death sentence. Although many assassins try to poison her, they all end up failing! In fact, the poisons Giselle ingests actually taste… good?! Can Giselle leverage this ability to survive her new surroundings?

title: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru
description: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too...?

title: Majo to Kyurasu
description: Long ago, the talented witch Shien hid her apprentice Tama from the witch hunts and then disappeared. Hundreds of years later, the two finally reunite in modern-day Japan! However, Shien is no longer the same; a "downer witch" is sitting by the window, smoking a cigarette...!

title: Amigara Dansou no Kai
description: Following an earthquake in an unnamed prefecture of Japan, a fault is discovered on Amigara Mountain, very close to the epicenter of the quake. On the slopes of the mountain, two hikers meet; a man named Owaki and a woman named Yoshida. The former assumes that they are both here to see the fault, which has captured the attention of the global press. Following the sound of voices to the fault, the two of them marvel at the strange sight before them: countless human-shaped holes in a rock face exposed by the earthquake.

title: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata
description:
Yoshiko Yokozawa is an office lady who loves cute things and being cute herself. Because of this, she is often not taken seriously and she is fed up with it. On the other hand, Chiaki Kurisu, a sales representative from a trading company, always seems very serious when she visits for business. For some reason, Kurisu suddenly invites Yokozawa to dinner!? Outside of work, Kurisu-san is completely different from her usual business-like behavior, being totally open and vulnerable...!?

"This woman, is cuter than me!?"

You can't help but fall for her. ♡ Adult girls-love ♡

title: Tokimori-san ga Muboubi desu!!
description: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!

title: Osananajimi wa, Nyaa to Naite Skirt no Naka
description: In the cat-filled town of Miyakecho, there is an urban legend that says cats sometimes put curses on humans. Ichika and Maki were once childhood friends until a certain incident led them to stop talking to each other. When Maki rushes in to save a mysterious white cat from an oncoming truck, however, she somehow finds herself under the cat's curse with Ichika being the only one she can turn to for help.

title: Daredemo Dakeru Kimi ga Suki
description:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even...!?
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)

title: Subaru to Subaru
description: One year after Takumi Fujiwara’s student Kanata Rivington tore it up on Japan’s mega-popular MFG street racing circuit, two new drivers are itching to try their luck at the event. Their names: Subaru Sato, from Gunma Prefecture, and Subaru Kudo, from Kanagawa. The worlds of Initial D and MF Ghost meld into one as these two Subarus join together to weave the ultimate street racing legend!

title: Hikagemono Demo Yarinaoshite Ii Desu ka?
description:
***I want a do over for the me who had no courage to speak of, and be born again as a new me.***

Koharu Kanba, who spent her gloomy high school days as a "social outcast", will now restart her life!!

(Source: CyComi)

title: Suiei-bu no Kininaru Senpai no On'nanoko
Centuria
description: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?!

title: DD Fist of the North Star
description:
**"In the year 199X… The world was NOT engulfed by the flames of nuclear war!"** 
  
Bat is your ordinary college student, working several part-time jobs to get by. But all that changes once his friend, Lin, brings in a man named Kenshiro to work at his convenience store. Bat quickly grows to hate Kenshiro - but unfortunately for him, that's just the beginning of many wacky adventures… And all he can do is retort!  
  
This is a gag manga of Fist of the North Star (Hokuto no Ken). Taking place in a world where the end of the century didn't happen, all the characters have relatively normal lives. The martial artists are all drawn Design Deformed (or DD), while most other characters look normal. However, this can be enjoyed both on its own and as a companion piece to the original Fist of the North Star!  
  
**Note:**  
[Was up for consideration for localization by SMA.](https://www.manga-audition.com/comic-zenon/dd-hokuto-no-ken-by-kajio/) However, SMA has stopped all attempts at localizing manga after December 2016.

Done by Osamu Kajisa, of [Bartender à Paris](https://mangadex.org/title/13da00cf-f2e1-40a5-a625-77c2c048e2b9/bartender-a-paris) fame. Here, he goes by the pen name Kajio(カジオ) which is a combination of his first and last name.

title: The War of Corpses
description: In an era where Necromancers create their own knights to fight, "War of the Corpses" is the ultimate sport. Amidst a brutal battle where countless people pour their passion and dreams into the fight, who will emerge as the final victor?

title: Doutei Yuusha wa Nakayoku Shitai
description: The hero and his party finally reach the Demon King's castle. However, the Demon King's room is cursed with a death sentence for any virgin who enters it!! In order to defeat the Demon King, the virgin hero and his fellow heroines try various strategies to get rid of their virginity... The heroines are shocked by the hero's terrible behavior... but it turns out that they are all in love with the hero...!?

title: Akuyaku Reijou Tensei Ojisan
description: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks...

title: Makenshi no Maken Niyoru Maken no Tame no Harem Life
description: Fujinomiya Soujirou is transported to a fantasy world with only his Daisho (pair of samurai swords) in hand. The katana can talk and swiftly informs him that it is Hotarumaru, the legendary national treasure of Japan thought lost during World War II. The wakizashi is too young to have a voice, so Souji names it Sakura. This is the story of Souji and Hotarumaru's journey through a new world as he seeks to achieve... a sword harem?

title: Mikoto-chan wa Kirawaretakunai!
description:
My beautiful, big-breasted childhood friend, Mikoto, is completely in love with me.
It sounds like a dream scenario that anyone would envy — but there’s just one big problem...
She’s turned into a clingy, mentally unstable mess with love that's way too heavy!!

This is a dark everyday comedy about being at the mercy of Mikoto’s unstable behavior and unintentional sexiness.

The long-awaited book release of the hit everyday romcom — the story of a mentally unstable beauty that took X (formerly Twitter) by storm — featuring all-new, never-before-published chapters!!

title: Soredemo Ashita mo Kareshi ga Ii
description: Kouhei and Mako are a couple deeply in love, but Kouhei worries about Mako’s reluctance to have sex with him. One day, Mako makes an unexpected proposal…

title: I Want to Be the Director's Husband
description: Kang A-jin, the CEO of Korea's No. 1 security company, and Joo-hyun, a super rookie in the actor community, will start a heartbreaking marriage! There is only one taboo: never fall in love.

title: yrhm: Yurihime 20th Anthology
description:
An anthology of all-new manga by nine of the finest authors who've graced *Yurihime*. The yuri manga you should read right now is here.

**Cover:** hechima
**Illustration:** Aono Nachi
**Comics:**
1. Saburouta
2. Miman
3. Aono Shimo
4. Yuama
5. Kashikaze
6. Kodama Naoko
7. Manio (Hanasaki Manio)
8. Iwami Kiyoko
9. Takeshima Eku

title: Rice Shoulder
description: The story revolves around a 202-pound, 18-year old girl named Okome Akino (whose name is a pun of "autumn rice"). After Okome enters a sumo match and wins against a male amateur fighter by a landslide, a trainer named Akane scouts her, and she enters the world of women's boxing.

title: Parashoppers
description: Mitsusada, a high school student with a unique way of looking at things, accidentally started a smartphone application that allows him to buy and sell special abilities. Suddenly, he is attacked by another person with special abilities, and he decides to use his abilities to fight back.

title: Futei no Olympia
description:
A dull, unreliable middle-aged salaryman, Tamaki Kuroudo, is treated as a hopeless old man by everyone. Teased about his pot belly, treated coldly by his daughter at home, and when he happens to glance at his wife’s phone, he sees suspicious call logs with one of her coworkers. 

As he spends his pathetic days, his capable subordinate Ayase Mizuki invites him to the equipment room. While helping her move some equipment, he accidentally touches her breast and she records that very moment on video. After work, he’s blackmailed with the video and taken to, of all places, a sports gym? 

The price of sexual harassment is body transformation? A secret muscle-training comedy he hides from his wife!

title: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-san
description: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

title: Haite Kudasai, Takamine-san
description:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

"Become my closet!"

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)

title: Last Boss-tachi no Kakushigo
description:
Reincarnated into the Demon King's castle?! Magic developed using programming skills! And even the Demon Kings recognize that magic——?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/68401)

title: Slime Seijo
description: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

title: Tensei Shite Inaka de Slow Life wo Okuritai
description:
The protagonist, Inaka Yuuji, was ran over by a truck because his awareness was dulled from overworking.
"Ahー, with this I don't have to work so much anymore. I want to spend my next life leisurely..." was the wish Yuuji blurted out. He met God and it was decided he will be reincarnated in the countryside of the other world. He became Alfred Slowlet, second son of a countryside noble.
Will he be able to enjoy and leisurely spend his slow life in the countryside?

title: Senyuu.
description:
Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

title: Shotgun Boy
description: While running for his life in the woods, bullying victim Gyuhwan stumbles upon a shotgun and just enough shells for his classmates. It’s a recipe for disaster. But fate takes an unexpected turn when he returns to find his classmates under attack by brain-eating creatures. Now, the only thing that stands in the way of their ravenous feast is a boy with a shotgun.

title: #Gyaru to Gyaru no Yuri
description: From the creator of "The Duke of Death and His Maid" comes Inoue's latest one-shot! When flashy high school gals Yua and Reina casually decide—on a whim—to date each other for a year, their spontaneous choice kicks off a wild and heart-thumping ride of laughs, love, and gyaru energy! A vibrant, youthful gyaru x gyaru couple comedy explodes onto the scene!!

title: Kono Fukushuu ni Gyaru wa Iranai
description: Nozomi Kashihara, a lonely hitman whose parents were killed, has never known warmth in his life. He betrayed the "family" that raised him and lived his life as a plain high school student, but after he saves a gal in his class from a group of delinquents, he somehow finds himself getting closer to her. Kashihara begins to suspect that she may be an assassin targeting him...

title: My Dear Detective: Mitsuko’s Case Files
description:
Mitsuko is Japan’s first woman detective in the turbulent 1930s! When a handsome college student shows up with a new case, he ends up assigned as her new assistant! Join Mitsuko and Saku as they solve cases, explore the changing cultural landscape of early Showa-era Japan, and maybe grow a little closer along the way in this fashionable mystery series. [Azuki]

[Official English Volumes (Seven Seas)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/my-dear-detective-mitsukos-case-files/)

title: Rinkoku kara Kita Yome ga Kawaisugite Doushiyou
description: Saryu, known as the Winter Bear of Tidros for his formidable presence that scatters enemies, suddenly finds himself in an engagement with Lady Shitoen, a noblewoman from a neighboring kingdom whose previous engagement was called off! Starting with a forehead kiss, he's nervous around a woman he's not used to. Her smile makes his heart race, and a glimpse of her chest leaves him flustered. As improper fantasies run wild in his mind, Saryu's rationality is on the verge of collapse?!

title: Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha ~Maou wa Sekai wo Seifukusuru Youdesu~
description:
After a life seemingly devoid of meaning, a man reincarnates in a new world as Yuri Ho. 

Immersed in novel experiences and embraced by parents who shower him with unprecedented affection, his will to live grows like never before. The future that lies before him is a peaceful existence on his father's ranch, breeding and raising birds to be ridden by warriors fighting distant wars. His new home, the Shiyalta Kingdom, has enjoyed peace and prosperity for centuries, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established following the collapse of a once-great empire. It seems no threat can compromise this idyllic lifestyle. 

However, when the effects of a neighboring kingdom’s war throw Yuri's family into crisis, he finds himself unable to stand by and watch.

title: Usuzumi no Hate
description:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans. Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land. Will humans be found? A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)

title: FAIRY TAIL: 100 Years Quest
description:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-100-years-quest/)

title: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love
description:
As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl...
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/exorcistboy_PR)

title: Nezumi no Hatsukoi
description:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand...
___
Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

title: Ranpo Amnesia - 21-banme no Jinkaku
description: Are you familiar with the mystery of the "Fiend with Twenty Faces"? A thief and a master of disguise, he used to steal only from the very rich. But it's been five years since he disappeared after developing a dissociative identity disorder. Now, his daughter Mayumi sets out to find him. In the process, she must find her way out of situations that keep getting more perverse and absurd as the story progresses... In this first volume of the series, Shintaro Kago offers us his take on the universe of the famous detective novelist Edogawa Rampo, one of the founding fathers of ero-guro. Kago's weirdness and Rampo's detective mysteries combine to form a world full of abnormalities and illusions!

title: 2.5 Jigen no Ririsa
description:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)

title: Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshikousei wo Hirou.
description: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.

title: Ao no Tatsuki
description: Yoshiwara, the largest Yukaku in Edo. In this town where the passions of the living and the dead swirl, Ao, a popular prostitute, was lost in a strange shrine. It was a "Chinese shrine" between Ukiyo-e and Meiji, where only those who strongly seek the benefits of the spiritual test can reach it...! Only prostitutes with a beautiful but sad past visit the company. To guide and save the soul... Ao unravels their lives with Rakumaru, the priest.

title: Isshiki-san wa Koi wo Shiritai.
description:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around... So, she makes a choice...?

title: Ore ga Ojou-sama Gakkou ni "Shomin Sample" Toshite Rachirareta Ken
description: In a hidden school surrounded by mountains, young ladies of good families are taught everything a high class lady needs to know. They are also completely cut off from the outside world, keeping them sheltered and innocent. However, a problem has come up recently– more and more graduates are failing to cope with the modern world after graduation. To deal with this problem, they've decided to kidnap a male commoner student, and enroll him as a student. They hope that this will be a gentle way to introduce the girls to the outside world. Kagurazaka Kimito is chosen for this dubious honor, mostly because he seems utterly average. However, the school leaders also seem to have concluded he's a homosexual with a muscle fetish. When Kimito hears that the alternative may be castration (to protect the girls' purity), he eagerly plays along with this misconception. Now he'll just have to survive the attention of many high class young ladies that are completely out of touch with the world.

title: Kimi wa Yotsuba no Clover
description: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?

title: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?
description: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...

title: Ingoku Danchi
description:
This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!

Yoshida is a tiny, frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father, the former manager, injured himself. Unbeknownst to him, this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?

title: Rokuhōdō Yotsuiro Biyori
description: At the popular Japanese-style tea house Rokuhoudou, customers can count on receiving not only excellent food and drink, but - if they wish for it - a helping hand in solving any problem that may be plaguing them. Serving in Rokuhoudou are four men who are consummate professionals in their individual fields: tea expert Sui, barista Gure, pâtissier Tsubaki and chef Tokitaka.

title: Sweet Home
description: Now a major adaptation on streaming. After an unexpected family tragedy, a reclusive high school student is forced to leave his home -- only to face something much scarier: a reality where monsters are trying to wipe out humanity. Now he must fight alongside a handful of reluctant heroes to try and save the world before it’s too late.

title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
description: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.

title: Top Dog Kim Jian
description:
A loser named Kim Jian transferred to Sujung High School... But actually, he’s the top dog of them all... and he's a girl!!
Jian’s parents, worried about their troublemaking daughter who’s been in fights with boys in the past, want to send her only to an all-girls school. But Jian wants to attend a co-ed school.
In the end, she’s allowed to go—on the condition that she'll disguise herself as a boy and keep it quiet...
But it’s already getting noisy!! -_-^

title: Dragon Ball Multiverse (Doujinshi)
description: 20 timelines that diverged from DBZ meet in a multiverse tournament! This ignores DBS.

title: Itsume
description: A girl trapped in her dreams to escape reality falls apart, forcing her to face the reality that haunts her.

title: Shukufuku no Ceska
description:
An authentic fantasy about Chesuka, a linguistic genius, and Siki, a beautiful prince of an oppressed people. In this world ruled by people who use “supernatural powers (lua)” given by God, people without powers are called “yagyu” and are subjected to discrimination. At the Makali Academy of the Republic of Nankan, where many children of royalty and rulers from around the world attend, it is a tradition to elect members of the student council, especially those of the most exalted status. The Yagoo prince Siki enters the school. 

Chesuka, who is in charge of interpretation in the student council, deepens her interaction with Shiki as his interpreter.

title: Soretomo Time Leap ni Suru?
description:
A lovey-dovey daily life with ara~ ara~ wife who can time leap!

Tokina is a self-proclaimed Timeleaper who loves to pamper her husband, Nobumichi. But today, there's something wrong with Nobumichi! While her husband accepts her sweet behavior without embarrassment, Tokina's flirting gradually escalates...?

title: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~
description: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power...?

title: Dorei o Choukyou Shite Harem Tsukuru
description: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life.

title: Nisemono no Renkinjutsushi
description:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!

title: Sono Apato, Zashikiwarashi-Tsuki Bukken ni Tsuki
description: Ryutaro Saeki (32) was divorced and returned to living alone again. He is quick to find a suspiciously cheap property, but in that room he was greeted by Zashiki Warashi. Bizarre and funny life of two people living together will start!

title: Karada Sagashi
description: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

title: Ueno-kun wa Kaihatsuzumi
description: "Spring! My college debut! The blossoming of my sexuality! Even now, I can't cum without being harassed by them." An unfortunate story in the spring of youth.

title: Ookii Muki Muki Chiisai Muchi Muchi
description: Every day, the muscular young man Kataoka dedicates himself to building his muscles. At his regular gym, there's one staff member he can't take his eyes off. Her name? Shiina. But what caught his attention wasn't her curves... it was her plump, round belly!?

title: Absolute Regression
description:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.

title: Goblin Slayer: Day in the Life
description: The manga will cover the story from the Goblin Slayer novel's 12th volume, and will focus on the adventurers' development as they live their everyday life.

title: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu ~Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni~
description:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!

title: Emiya-san Chi no Kyou no Gohan
description:
"Fulfilling meal... a familiar view.”

In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. It's nothing but an ordinary meal scene... Delicious meals are served at the Emiya's dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter. – Let's see... what's for dinner today?

title: SSS-geup Jugeoya Saneun Hunter
description:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor!
