But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
description: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!

title: Hatarakanai Futari
description: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.

title: Ashi-Girl
description:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

title: Gin no Mugibatake
description:
The "Golden Wizard" is the hero who saved a kingdom, and the "Silver Wizard" is the wicked mage who killed the king.
One day, May, a baker's daughter living in the country where the legend of the two wizards was born, finds a grain of wheat in shining silver on the outskirts of town. What awaits her is a "silver wheat field" covered in shimmering stalks of silver wheat. This is a silvery fantasy woven by wizards.

(Source: GFantasy, translated)

---
Note: Originally a one-shot story published in GFantasy, it was picked up for full serialization by the magazine starting 2023-02-18.

title: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples
description: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

title: Doom Breaker
description:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6325420), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=774044)

**Official Translations:**

* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3406)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3217)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/periodic/tag_item_list?tag_id=1014363&t=1657211210896)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3342)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/battle-god/list?title_no=3190)

title: Sanju Mariko
description:
The manga centers on veteran novelist Mariko Kōda, who lives with the families of both her son and her grandson in one house. Feeling like she no longer has any place in her home, she decides to leave the house and strike out on her own, beginning with living in a manga cafe in the city.

Won 42nd Annual Kodansha Manga Award for "Best General Manga" (2018)

title: Alice, Dokomademo
description:
"Aim for it! The first Japanese female astronaut commander!"

The middle school girl Asahida Alice is good-looking and popular, but her language is poor-quality and she can't keep up with her daily classes. She meets a solitary genius, Inuboshi...?

"I will make you smart."
___
**Award:** Winner of Manga Taishou 2025.

title: Realist Maou ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku
description:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his 'wisdom from his past life,' he would rule over his lands as a thorough 'realist.'

"Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?"
"Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy."

"Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?"
"To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct."

"The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?"
"Not bullets, shoot them with cannons."

And like that, Astaroth 'reformed' the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.

title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
description:
I returned to Earth after hunting demons in the otherworld for three hundred years. However, I did not return alone.

**Official Translations**
[Simplified Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yushentongguideqishiwang/list?title_no=2594) 
[Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-king-of-knights-returns-with-god/list?title_no=5491)

title: Ouran High School Host Club
description: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]

title: Persephonia
description: "I wished upon a star-filled night to meet you again." My love was granted in a distorted form. Me, a human, and you, who devours humans. In such a cruel world, how do we weave our love?

title: GudaGuda Ace
description: It's not Koha Ace! It's not the European Death Front 1945 either! Here comes a new serialization!

title: Kimi wa Ore no Yasashikunai Haru
description:
With a height of 192 cm and a scar on his face, Ujioka Tasuku is mistaken for a "scary person" by those around him, and his student life has been lonely up until now. On his first day of high school, Ujioka is determined to make friends and have a fun high school life, but a shocking encounter with Shimohoshizaki Kodzuru awaits him after she trips on a banana peel! She's completely out of it, but Ujioka is touched by Shimohoshizaki's hard work and she doesn't judge Ujioka by his appearance, so they decide to become friends!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E5%90%9B%E3%81%AF%E3%81%8A%E3%82%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%84%AA%E3%81%97%E3%81%8F%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84%E6%98%A5)

title: Watashi yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon shitai no - Seiso na Biji Seito Kaichou (Jitsu wa Moto Banchou) no Himitsu wo Shiru Inkya (Jitsu wa Kanojo wo Koeru Saikyou no Yankee)
description: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!

title: Gyaru Sen
description: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!

title: Legendary Prodigy Of The Duke
description: Summoned into another world, Han Sung worked his entire life as the empire’s SSS-class monster hunter. After countless struggles, he lost his life and came back as the first-born son of the Jackson Duchy, ‘Dale’. He was the continent’s greatest dark magician and the leader of the dark tower, The Black Duke’s son. ‘I will destroy the empire with my own hands.’ Swords, magic, and the art of strategy. With his previous life’s knowledge and intelligence as his background, Dale is reborn as the genius of the duchy. Just how far will his abilities go? His adventure starts now without an inkling of hesitation!

title: Summer Moon: The Cupid
description:
"Under the pink-tinted summer moon, a high school girl's 'magical girl double life' begins!"

Wolgo High School is famous for its mystical forest that will help you find your soulmate. With the 'Summer Moon Festival', the school's biggest summer festival where you can find the love of a lifetime, just one month away, the school grounds are filled with pink excitement. Freshman Han Yeo-Reum, whose goal is to find someone to confess to by the festival day, tries to confess to the most popular male upperclassman in school... but at that moment, out of nowhere, she turns into a ☆magical girl☆?!

title: Red Blue
description: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.

title: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusen-mochi datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei Toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai
description:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he's always dreamed of!
___
**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)

title: Shinyu ga TS shita hanashi
description: A 4-Koma Ts comics of The typical Cliche where the Mc's Bestfriend turns into a girl one day.

title: Ura Kagyou Tensei: Moto Gokudou ga Kazoku no Tame ni Ryouchi Hatten Sasemasu ga Nani ka? @COMIC
description:
A yakuza who lived his entire life as a lone wolf is reincarnated into another world as Ryu, the third son of a noble knightly family. For the first time, he experiences the warmth of a loving family and grows up cherished. However, he soon realizes that his kindhearted family, though strong in battle for generations, is hopelessly bad at business and incredibly poor! Deciding he has no choice but to step up, Ryu first sets out to reform their finances.

Utilizing his mysterious "Gokudo" skill and knowledge from his past life's shady dealings, he successfully sells the crops he cultivates. He even makes a fortune with a food stall at a local festival, launching one new venture after another. But as the family's fortunes rise, so too does the jealousy of worthless nobles who begin to hold a grudge against them.

title: Male God, Your Persona Has Collapsed!
description:
Reborn back to his college days, Zhou Yuwen knew well the importance of maintaining one’s image.
In this life, his labels were: maturity and extraordinary talent!

“I’m a rather traditional guy. I believe love comes with responsibility — so one must be cautious when falling in love.”

“Zhou Yuwen, let’s remarry!”

“Get lost! I already have a girlfriend!”

He runs, she chases — and even with wings, there’s no escape!

title: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Swaying in the Rain, Looking for the Sunshine
description:
I believed it was destiny that brought us together. It's my irreplaceable home, warm like spring sunshine. Therefore…
Here is the newly depicted story of the lost girls from the TV anime *BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!*. (Comic Growl)

title: Madan no Ichi
description: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!

title: Uchi no Kuroneko, Onna no Ko
description:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

---

Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M_terU116/status/1816775907320955112)
Alternative Tankobon Links - [Animate](https://www.animate-onlineshop.jp/pn/pd/3277397/), [Gamers](https://www.gamers.co.jp/pn/pd/10842472/)

title: Keiyaku Shimai
description:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

title: Girls × Vampire
description: **Alt Official Raw:** [note](https://note.com/girls_vampire)

title: Sasinpyowol
description:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55706014)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%8B%A0%ED%91%9C%EC%9B%94/2937), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59771249)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-reaper)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%AD%BB%E7%A5%9E%E6%BC%82%E6%9C%88/380)
* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/614)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-reaper-de)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119365)

title: The Princess is Dead!
description: A hitman targets a princess who lives in lavish luxury. When she arrives, she finds her flirting with the prince. The prince steps in to protect her, but in the struggle, the princess hits her head and dies instantly. Though the hitman succeeds without staining her hands, the prince makes an unexpected and shocking request…

title: The Flower That Wields a Sword
description:
An empire stained with blood

That day, consumed by the cursed sword, I cut down the people I loved most with my own hands.

Fifteen years have passed under its curse. Now, having claimed all ten legendary swords forged by man, I made a wish upon the holy sword.

"Take me back—to the time I killed anyone."

Time rewound to the moment before all tragedies began. And yet, the sword remained in my hand.

This time, I won't succumb in the same way. Neither the cursed sword, nor fate, nor anyone else will control me again.

"There won't be a second miracle.
This time, I will find happiness."

title: The Last Immortal's Theorem
description:
"I thought I was doomed to endless despair."

Ylledia, an immortal, "trapped" by eternity, feels helpless witnessing her loved ones perish. Her deep sorrow intensifies when she has to let go of the only other immortal in the world.

Yet, just as she's losing all hope, a vibrant, golden-haired mortal named Dennis enters her life, suggesting they "link up". The moment Ylledia meets Dennis, a glimmer of hope for the world is rekindled within her. Could this boy be the key to saving the world?

Fueled by the newfound hope over their magical connection, Ylledia commits to saving the world once again.

title: VOCALOID - The Daily Life of Master & Hatsune Miku (Doujinshi)
Norigam
description:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.

title: Ori no Naka
description: Gomi Jirou, a 29-year-old virgin, has spent the past 9 years nerding out with his work colleagues about anime during lunch and drawing erotic doujinshi at night so he can masturbate. However, one day, this comfort zone of his is thrown into disarray by the introduction of a new colleague, Yumezora Kuroko, a bespectacled beauty with long, dark hair and a massive chest. It only takes a moment to fall in love, just like how it takes a moment to lose your footing.

title: Ouji-sama no Tomodachi
description:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!

title: Bakuchi Gui
description: Raised by an older brother who was a genius gambler and learned countless tricks of the trade, the man known as "Bull" knows every kind of cheat. However, he himself has never used any of them—he lives a regular life as a full-time office worker. Then one day, his brother goes missing. As Bull searches for him, he uncovers a clue: his brother has fallen into "the Swamp," a deadly gambling den where those consumed by greed end up. To save the kind brother he once knew—and to uncover his brother's hidden side—Bull steps into "the Swamp"!

title: Narutaru
description:
The story could basically be split into two halves. The main story is about Tamai Shiina, who is an energetic middle-school teenage girl. She visits her grandparent's over the summer where she runs into a very strange creature. Shiina has had lots of strange dreams as of late and also when she was younger, and this strange creature is somewhat related to her visions. She names the small cuddly star-shaped creature, Hoshimaru.  
  
Little did she know that this cuddly creature is really part of herself. After her vacation, Shiina goes back to her home, living with her father. She runs into other children with similar creatures the following days. However, these children have developed their creatures, and they have complete control over them. They mostly use these creatures for their own destructive pleasure and not for good. There is a group of teenagers that all have these strange creatures, and they plan to basically conquer the world, creating a utopia of whatever they desire. Will they succeed? Will Shiina ever develop Hoshimaru?

title: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
description: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!

title: Kizoku Tensei ~Megumareta Umare kara Saikyou no Chikara o Eru~
description: Born as the Thirteenth Prince, Noah was originally in a position removed from the imperial succession, so he freely passed his time in the fief granted to him. However, the Crown Prince died before the Emperor. The imperial succession would be fairly contested among the remaining princes. Noah, being the strongest despite living freely, overwhelmed the other princes and eventually became the Emperor with the most power in the world.

title: Akuyaku no Goreisoku no Dou ni ka Shitai Nichijou
description:
The beloved third son of a ducal house aims to escape his villainous fate!?
Back when I (age 6) was still a spoiled brat laughing arrogantly, I regained memories of my past life. This is an RPG world?! And worse, I’m destined to be crushed by the hero, labeled the weakest of the three brothers… aka the villain. Talk about bad luck. This sucks.  

After panicking, moping, and overthinking, I made a decision: First, quit being a villain! I’ll become a good boy, get along with my beloved older brothers and the servants, and dodge every death flag!!

title: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita
description: During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.

title: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
description:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!

title: Your Throne
description: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

title: Danjo-hi 1: 39 No heikō sekai wa omoi de sumire no sakurasō (sakura sou) wa futsūjanai...
description:
A parallel world with a 1:39 male to female ratio. Sumire, the older sister, notices something strange about her younger brother, Sou. Sumire challenges her brother's "unusual" affection and the truth of love and longing in this world. 

This is a fan comic of the manga  "A Parallel World with a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio is Surprisingly Normal."

title: Dragon Ball
description:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**

title: Blooming Love
description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!?

title: Gokurakugai
description:
Gokurakugai, a bright and bustling working class district with a hidden dark side. In this area without order, Tao and Alma work as troubleshooters for hire. Their missions involve helping a young boy find his lost friend, a person who disappears without a trace, and disfigured animal corpses. All the while, the evil spirits who live in the shadows bring out a different side to these troubleshooters!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/gokurakugai)

title: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign
description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.

title: Re/Member: The Last Night
description: Karada Sagashi is back! Set in an amusement park after midnight, this latest installment in the hit survival horror series is set to hit theaters in Japan in September 2025 as a live-action film. Don't miss the manga adaptation before the movie drops!

title: MAD
description: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they're targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

title: Dandadan
description:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.

title: Blue Exorcist
description:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.

title: Merry Marbling
description: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.

title: I'm Really Not the Demon God's Lackey
description: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG Structures
description:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*

title: Steins;Gate - Mendou na Danjo no Tsukiaikata ni tsuite (Doujinshi)
description: A short slice of life Kurisu x Rintaro story.

title: Elf ga Gendai ni Itara
description:
An anthology about Elves living in modern society.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [If Elves Existed in the Present Day ~Part Timer~ (Pre-Serialization)](https://mangadex.org/title/e42799d9-4829-4b4c-b898-96f3b0b45566/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day-part-timer)), [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/libre1907/status/1366501046890024962) (Chapter 1)
- Defunct Twitter/X Chapter Index - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1430365122187304960)

title: Asana Tansaku Kikou
description:
---
Alt Raw: [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/3625614/series/283218)

title: The Genius Blacksmith's Game
description:
The last blacksmith and master artisan left in the world. His hands are crippled in a forge fire, rendering him unable to craft any longer. But then, a virtual reality game, Ares, comes knocking on Hyun-soo’s door.

[Unrepairable Artifact.] [Cannot be crafted due to level restrictions.] “Huh? I consider myself a manual blacksmith, though.”

For him, no system restrictions apply. The tumultuous game of the genius blacksmith begins.

title: Love Gives Me Superpowers
description: Art student Zhong Shenxiu encountered a problem during a sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the sketch. If she can't truly see the subject then she can't draw. Zhong Shenxiu put down her paintbrush. If she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? If she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until the distance between them is no more--Face to face. Phew! Now I can finally see her! But! This is... Too close! Help! What Should I do?!!!

title: Ikemen Joshi to Josou Danshi
description: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!

title: Ri-chan
description:
Due to work, Tatsu moves back into his parents' house; soon after that, he encounters a young woman who turns out to be Ri-chan, the little girl he used to play together with in his childhood. However, this girl he reunited with has somehow become very different from the cheerful childhood friend in his memories...

---

Additional Links

Volume/Tankoubon release:
* [Comic Beam](https://comicbeam.com/product/322312000115.html) (Publisher)
* [Kadokawa Store](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000115)

title: Norainu to Tenshi-chan
description:
His name is Touji, 20 years old. Following a certain incident that made him infamous, his only way get by is by working insconspicuous part-time jobs without involving himself with others. 

One day, while working at a supermarket, he gets dragged into a conflict between an employee and a rude Customer and ends up getting acquainted with a beautiful high school girl named Sakuya. 

Though she is blessed with an astounding memory, which some even call her ''super eye'', she struggles to adjust to her school life. In this illustrated human drama, those two who have difficulty adapting to this cruel society begin their share-house lifestyle and grow together.

title: Demon Academy
description: The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces. Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 7: Steel Ball Run (Official Colored)
description: In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.

title: Kono Ura Aka, Sensei desho?
description:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.

title: Rikka Kitan
description:
Touma, a young wolf beastman who loves a peaceful life, is a regular policeman who protects the peace of the town of Edo. One night, he meets a mysterious girl who is being attacked by thugs. The girl's name is Rikka. She is a princess from the faraway country of Izumo, and is being pursued because she has a big secret. Touma happens to help her and ends up hiding her. Tired of her life on the run, Touma decides to offer peace to Rikka, but living with a girl for the first time is far from peaceful and marks the beginning of a very turbulent life!

(Source: Comic Days, translated)

title: Bel's Hell
description: A nun falls in love with her sleep paralysis demon.

title: Negatte mo Nai Tsuihou Go kara no Slow Life? ~Intai Shita Hazu ga Nariyuki de Bishoujo Gal no Shishou ni Nattara Naze ka Mechakucha Natsukareta~
description:
Reito Harukaze, who had climbed to the highest rank of adventurers, had retired. One day, as he was thinking of living a quiet, retired life, a beautiful gal named Karen Hiiragi appeared before him.

"Hey, mister, buy me a meal!"

Upon hearing that Karen was in trouble with money, Reito decided to give her a basic lecture on dungeon conquering.

"Thanks to you, I was able to conquer my first dungeon! Master!"

He actually wanted to retire and live a slow life...

title: Youkya ni Natta Ore no Seishun Shijou Shugi
Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo-tachi ni Kakomare nagara Boukensha Seikatsu
description:
Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!?

Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her...?

Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!

title: Bad Girl
description:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?

(Source: Comic Fuz, edited)

title: Ki ni Naru Kurumi-san!
description: A plain, quiet guy named Fujimori admires a girl who's too beautiful — Kurumi. Because of his shy personality, he freezes up and can't speak when he gets attention, so he's never once talked to her and they shouldn't have any connection… or so he thought? A wild, emotionally intense beauty and a gloomy, oblivious boy — their clumsy, mismatched love comedy begins!

title: Inazuma Eleven Special
description: A promotional manga recapping the story of inazuma eleven

title: Mahoui Rex no Hentai Karte
description:
In a world where the demon lord had been defeated and peace had arrived, Rex the magical doctor ran a clinic. But the patients brought in were all beyond saving compared to the world itself, people who'd XXX slimes or stuck their peens into man-eaters!? An otherworld perverted medical comedy begins!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67171)
- [Official X](https://x.com/magicdr_rex)

title: Osoraku Kanojo wa Ore no Aniki wo Neratteru
description: A high school guy who doesn't trust girls anymore has been tricked too many times by girls who just wanted to get close to his good-looking older brother. After all that, he decides he'll never trust a girl again. But then, a pretty girl in his class suddenly starts talking to him a lot. Is she just trying to get to his brother too...? Or does she actually mean something else?

title: Imouto ga Onna Kishi Gakuen ni Nyuugaku Shitara Naze ka Kyuukoku no Eiyuu ni narimashita. Boku ga.
description:
My little sister enrolled in an all-girls academy that trains aspiring knights. Even at this academy, renowned as the most prestigious in the kingdom, my brilliant little sister still easily displays her overwhelming prowess!

"Nii-san, I told you already—you're much stronger than someone like me!"

No, I'm just an ordinary commoner, you know...
(※That's a lie. Nii-san is insanely strong. He just doesn't realize it.)

Because of that, a female knight from the academy appeared and challenged me to a mock battle.
(※The strongest female knight in the academy instantly realized the difference in their strengths.)

Then, I gave her some post-battle care.
(※The female knight enjoyed Nii-san's massage so much that it became popular among the nobility.)

And just by doing what I normally do, I caught the eye of the QueenーEh? Why!?

title: Otome Game no Heroine de Saikyou Survival
description:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she's determined to carve her own path.
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)

title: Banjou no Orion
description:
Losing one match after another, shogi prodigy Yuhi Ninomiya became a shadow of his former glorious self. It was then that he faced his old rival Kanata Kuji in an official match. However, the record-setting match ended with Kanata winning his 27th consecutive game, and Yuhi losing his 17th consecutive game. Feeling frustrated and depressed, Yuhi stops by a bar, when he has a fateful encounter with a certain girl! Her name is Tsuki Kayamori. Although she is overbearing, self-centered, and eccentric, her sharp and unorthodox playstyle is as if she was chosen by the shogi God!

(Source: K Manga)

title: Tensei Mae no Tutorial de Isekai Saikyou ni Narimashita. - Junbishi Sugite Daini no Jinsei wa Easy Mode desu!
description:
One day, a 33-year-old man who spent all his time playing video games to escape reality from an unreasonable life of bullying and power harassment died. However, he was chosen as a candidate for reincarnation to another world, but the woman who guided him to his reincarnation told him that she would not give him any cheats. Instead of cheats, he was offered three months of training at an otherworldly reincarnation training facility. The training facility was supposed to make it relatively easy to acquire skills, but what would he accomplish in three short months? He was given an Appraisal and an Item Box as bonus skills, but he was thrown into the training facility before he could even begin to set up his prowess.

He spent three months in the training facility, desperately training to survive his new life. But after 3 months, after 1 year, after 10 years, he was not reincarnated. He was worried he might have gone to the infinite hell of the game world since he died from playing too much video games, but he still trained desperately. In fact, he never thought that the reincarnation process was not completed due to a mistake made by the female guide. After all, when 15 years of training had passed, the information about reincarnation came unexpectedly. The man who had already become a cheat bastard to the point of killing an ancient dragon was trying his best to enjoy the other world in a normal way.

title: Yell Girl!
description:
From Maiu Cafe:  « A voice, some cheers… and a destiny that changes! »
Yuyu, a first-year high school student, is instantly captivated by the cheer squad’s performance during club introductions. Determined to join, she’s shocked to find herself paired with Kozuka, the most irritating boy in her class…!? A thrilling story of friendship, love, and the passion of cheerleading.

title: Mikadono Sanshimai wa Angai, Choroi.
description:
Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
___
**Official English:** [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/dealing-with-mikadono-sisters-is-a-breeze) - United States & Canada only.

title: Baka Ni Kokuhaku
description: Ayumu Otsuki is a space lover with an ambitious dream—to meet an alien. Despite lacking friends or romantic experience, she started the Astronomy Association by herself, which is the only place where she feels she belongs. One day after school, she dropped an association poster, but an upperclassman picked it up for her. The upperclassman introduced herself as Hayami, and Ayumu completely fell in love at first sight when Hayami recognized her passion! Ayumu's mind is now filled with love, and she goes all out to share her feelings. However, Senpai seems to already adore something else. She fell for a fitness junkie?! A peculiar girl's straightforward romcom!!

title: Vampire Knight
description: Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight, when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm, they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school. Yuki Cross and Zero Kiryu are the Guardians of the school, protecting the Day Class from the Academy's dark secret: the Night Class is full of vampires!

title: Alma-chan wa Kazoku ni Naritai
description: A slice-of-life comedy about an ultimate weapon in the shape of a cute little girl named "Alma", and the two scientists who created her! These two scientific geniuses are constantly being befuddled by Alma's incisive questions and analysis of their relationship!

title: Your Eyes Only
description:
This series is named after the James Bond film For Your Eyes Only. Aston Machan has a condition that only her trainer is able to see her, how do they break out of this predicament?

Buy on [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/home-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ01082064.html)

title: Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree
description:
Aseo, a poor, Tarnished wretch, finds himself cast out into Limgrave—naked, penniless, hopeless, and maidenless. His only hope in his harsh, unforgiving new home is a mysterious woman named Melina. She urges him to follow the guidance of grace to the Erdtree that looms over the Lands Between. But it won't be an easy road; a cast of colorful characters awaits Aseo along the way—Patches the Untethered, Blaidd the Half-Wolf, Margit the Fell Omen, Godrick the Grafted, and of course, Ranni the Witch... With little but a loincloth between Aseo and certain death, he strikes out for the first stop on his quest: Stormveil Castle. Will he make it there, or will his journey end before it even begins?
___
**Note:** Aside from the original Japanese, this series is being digitally simulpubbed in English, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Latin American Spanish, and Thai. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310))
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/elden-ring-the-road-to-the-erdtree)

title: Hellsing
description:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---

title: Koujo Tensei: Densetsu no Dai Madoushi (♂), Hime Kishi to Narite Densetsu no Reijou Kishidan o Tsukuri Musou Suru
description:
"I also wanted to be... the strongest in the world." 

An Arch Mage who died without fulfilling his dream wakes up to finds himself being reincarnated as a member of the imperial family. And what's more is that his new body has a talent for close-quarters combat! This time he holds hope that he finally might be able to fulfill his desire of being world's strongest... 

But after reincarnating his new name is Evangeline. Indeed, he had become a girl.
In her princess life where muscle training and fighting are forbidden, Eva brings dumbbells to her room and wields a sword! And before long, she becomes the strongest!?

A fantasy about a tomboy princess' rise to the top!

title: Yarinaoshi Kizoku no Seinjinka Level Up
description:
One winter day, Selim succumbed to the Devil's Temptation and transformed into a Demon. Before being killed by the Hero, he slaughtered the people of the Royal Capital and the nobles, and pulled the trigger for the devils to invade the Kingdom. After Selim's death, the devils overthrew the Royal Capital and destroyed the Kingdom. Selim, who was trapped by the devil and watched the Kingdom fall, somehow found himself returning to his 14-year-old self. A message written on a transparent panel floats in front of him.

"You have become a seeker. By doing the right things and accumulating virtues, your level will increase."

title: Futari nara Doko e demo
description: Office worker Joji got married a month ago, and his wife is Karen from Russia. She is beautiful like an angel, and shines with her bright silver hair. However, Karen is a mangaka, so they can't do what a married couple would, due to her busy schedule. When Karen's work settles down, they can finally spend time together after a while. In order to do things a married couple would, Joji decided to take his wife on... a honeymoon!!! The couple who got to know each other through travelling decided to return to their roots and headed for Niijima Village...!! Let's go on a trip together♪

title: On the Way to Meet Mom
description:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.

title: Toki no Ori ~Shini Modori no Reisou Tsukai, [Copy] Nouryoku de Saikyou e to Itaru~
description:
"I'll kill the Demon Lord who's trying to wipe out humanity no matter what it takes..."

In a desperate battle against the Demon Lord, Link loses one of his dearest friends. Fueled by his comrade's dying wish, he unleashes a desperate final blow. But it's not enough. The Demon Lord’s army of magical beasts overwhelms humanity, and the world falls. Link should've died. And yet... he wakes up, back in time, as his ten-year-old self?! Now, with the memories and battle experience from his past life, Link vows to change the future. This time, he'll do whatever it takes to defeat the Demon Lord once and for all.

title: I Became a Doting Father
description:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title: Queen's Seed
description: Yuto follows Mikoto, a childhood friend and high school girl who is one year older, to enter the same high school. When she goes home with Mikoto for the first time in a year, it turns out that Mikoto only sees Yuto as her younger brother. Yuto is a little dizzy about the difficult road ahead, but an alien "onee-san" in a very erotic outfit appears in front of the two...!? "One Shota" space opera opens here!!

title: One Piece (Official Colored)
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**

title: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Romcom
description: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.

title: Dekisokonai Ouji no Nariagari ~Seikon Nashi no Dai San Ouji ni Tensei Shitakedo, Kondokoso Kazoku wo Mamoru Tame ni Saikyou wo Mezasu~
description: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

title: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon
description:
The Skeleton Soldier is a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

"I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!"

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.

title: D.Gray-man
description:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."

After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.

title: Hirano to Kagiura
description: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!

title: Gohan ga Tanoshimi
description:
"So, what shall I eat today?"

Tuna and cheddar cheese, an egg sandwich, and strawberry daifuku toast are breads that brighten the morning.The unforgettable pasta from that neighbourhood shop run by real artisans. Washing down sizzling hot dumplings with drinks would be the perfect weekend bliss. 
A special brunch with the table filled with crepes.Packing a pretty tin with all my favourite snacks.My favourite cute cup.Buying a new dining table to welcome a new way of living.

Ida Chiaki, beloved for 'Ie Ga Suki Na Hito', draws her very first essay manga here, depicting about the many small joys of eating. It's warm, grounded, and filled with the texture of everyday life. It's such a delicious ramble. Well then, go ahead and dig in.

title: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeong Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida
description:
S-class Hunter Kim Yiyoung can't wait to leave the novel she woke up in. She gets the chance after defeating the story's final boss, but instead of returning home, she's sent into another novel! Yiyoung becomes Lady Renee Markious, a petty villainess who's just been framed for murder. Fortunately, Yiyoung has a secret weapon nobody knows about… her skills from her past life! Can Yiyoung clear Renee's name and find her way back to her own world? Or will she be trapped in this tale for good?

---
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"

title: CMYK - Sameda Kazuou wa Chuunibyou ga Naosenai
description: Sameda Kazuou who has finally escaped from his Chuunibyou syndrome, wants to erase the fact that he was like that at all, and decides to bury all of his school photos that are engraved with his past. However, there are three beautiful girls in the school who want those photos...

title: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
description:
Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first), [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/)
- [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)

title: "Sono Hen no Kusa demo Kuttoke" to Tsuihou Sareta Munou Skill [Shokubutsugui] Mochi Tenseisha, Elf no Sato de Maboroshi no Shokubutsu wo Tabete Musou Suru
description: "Just go and eat some of that grass over there," was what Aki, a reincarnated person, was told when he was banished from the Viscount Guinas Household because of his useless skill, [Plant Eater].  However to Aki, being banished was an opportunity for him to break free from the constrained life of a noble and enjoy his second chance at life.  "Your stats have been drastically increased.", "Skill [Absorption] has been acquired."  Aki's skill which should've 'only' allowed him to eat any vegetation, truly manifested after he ate various mythical plants, including a leaf from the World Tree itself.  By using his skills, he became a legendary existence sought after by the whole country. After saving the elf girl Saras, he became the only human to gain the elves' trust. Brushing aside the nobles, royalty, and other people in power who wanted a connection with the elves, he became an existence that could represent the entire continent.  As for the Guinas family and Aki's younger brothers who banished him, it became difficult for them to get a connection with the elves, and what's more is that they  got themselves into a nasty predicament, but...

title: Mini 4WD Fighter V
description: Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.

title: Yuri Yuri Panic: Touto Sugiru Jian ga Hassei Shiteimasu!
description: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...?

title: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi
description: A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"! Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?

title: Dare ga Yuusha wo Koroshita ka
description:
Four years have passed since the Demon King's defeat. To honor the deceased Hero, the now-at-peace Kingdom launches a project to compile his many achievements. The Hero's former companions, the Sword Saint Leon, the Saintess Maria, and the Great Sage Solon, are interviewed. All of them are unclear about the truth behind the Hero's death. Why did the Hero die? Was it the Demon King who killed him, or his companions?
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37)

**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/daregayu)

title: Nimotsu Mochi no Noukin Musou
description:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill "Porter," which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party "Black Lion of Foresight." One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk's skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

title: Kinnikuman II-Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc
description: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.

title: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de
description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

title: Wolf x Rabbit
description:
Shape-shifting wolf and rabbit couple  
  
  
  
[Creator's weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2673967277)

title: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita
description:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official Raws: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71616), [X (Formerly known as Twitter.)](https://x.com/sa_ra_na_mi/status/1739058372568338764)
- Buy the collected volumes from [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/products/detail.php?product_id=2708014) or TORANOANA: [1](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/), [2](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031208076/)

title: MF Ghost
description: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

title: Kirei na Onee-san to Nomu Osake wa Suki desu ka?
description: By chance, ordinary salaryman Hiyoshi ends up becoming a drinking buddy to his admired senpai from work, Tsukizawa-san. However, all the drinkeries that Tsukizawa-san brings him to are weird places…!? An adult love comedy featuring drinking spots that exist in real life!

title: Ano Oni Kyoushi ga Boku no Ane ni Narundesuka?
description: A boy is initially overjoyed at the news of him having an older sister, due to his father remarrying to a woman who has a daughter. That is, until he finds out that his new sister is actually his school's strict PE teacher, Shina. With his father going off to live with his new wife, the boy will live alone with his new sister. In their new life together, the boy finds out that Shina at home is completely different from Shina at work: clumsy, scared of insects, and kind.

title: Winners Circle e Youkoso
description: Being a manga author has always been Yamakawa Nanao’s dream. He even postponed college for two years so that he could pursue it, but when his work that he put everything he has into it is rejected by every publisher, he loses hope. At a below average college and no real direction in life, Nanao meets a fortune teller that leads him to the horse tracks. There, he meets a group of college students, Beniko, Midori, Shun and Soukichi, who form their own winner's circle, a group of people who bet on horses not for entertainment but as a form of income. Nanao has no knowledge of horse betting but his ability to see the smallest of details in the horses shocks the members and he is allowed to join the club. If he plays it right, he could make an extremely comfortable living off of this new found talent.

title: The Sales Rep Who Absolutely Won’t Come VS The Researcher Who Absolutely Wants to Make Her Come
description: A researcher for an adult toy company has created a new product for women, but needs to convince the sales rep of its quality...

title: The House Without Time
description: An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.

title: Yukidoke no Hito
description: The Love Story of Yuki Onna

title: Yaiteru Futari
description: Dating can be tough when you nerd out over barbecue. Kenta, a practical pitmaster, looks for a grill-friend in Chihiro, an aloof and faultless business babe... or is she? Scared of being rejected for who they really are, the two of them find comfort in food and each other... and all is well until Kenta must transfer away. With their developing relationship at steak, Chihiro proposes they tie the knot and they marry for better or wurst. Winging a long-distance marriage is one thing, but here's the rub — they barely know each other!

title: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau
description: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

title: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru, Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~
description: In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self?? To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures... "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!

title: Mao Zhi Ming
description: The young girl Moli who was about to enter high school, was struck by lightning while running late and was sent to Continent of Mingzu. What is this, so it’s a Q version of a world?! What about the promised beautiful youth! Oh well, at least everyone is half beast~ I’ll reluctantly join in for the time being! The status of a magician or some other heavy responsibilities like that, I don’t want it. I just want to foolishly spend my sweet time being. Selfish!

title: Nine Methods of Ascending the Clouds: First Ranked Immortal
description: If you want to learn how to be a god, you can ride a crane to the sky. Turning stones into gold? You can do so in mere seconds!

title: Splatoon
description: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

title: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~
description: One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!?

title: Poro's Foreign Exchange Records
description:
The manga centers on Poro, a demon from the underworld who comes to the human world.  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Poro's Foreign Exchange Records were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

title: Mitakihara Youchien Mahou-gumi
description: A light-hearted spin-off of Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica where Madoka, Homura, Sayaka and Kyoko attend a kindergarten operated by Kyubey with Mami as the teacher.

title: Inside the Tentacle Cave
description: Deep in the tunnels of an abandoned mine lurks a demon that absorbs the power of anything it touches: the Black Ooze. When it consumes its first human male, it acquires both intelligence and ravenous sexual desire, much to the distress of a sorceress who mistakenly enters its domain. The heroes who seek glory and riches in these caverns are about to learn why monsters should be feared!

title: Densetsu no Ore
description: Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero!

title: Natsume Yuujinchou
description:
Natsume's just an ordinary kid, except he can see spirits just like his grandma Reiko could. Reiko, though, used to bully the spirits, and bound them to her will in the "Book of Friends." Now that Natsume has inherited this book, a never-ending stream of spirits is coming after him. With the help of a spirit "cat" (who really just wants Natsume to die so he can have the book), Natsume spends his days dissolving the contracts that bind the spirits and trying not to get killed.
___
Extras:
* Manabiya no Sumi (In the Corner of the Schoolyard) in v.6.
* Natsu ni wa Tameiki (w)o Tsuku (Heave a Sigh in Summer) in v.7.

title: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san, Nibanme wa Ore.
description: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?

title: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero
description: For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does. The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone. It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters. He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.

title: Tonari no Osoegawa
description: In the Magic Realm, mages train hard to master their arts. However, one mage named Toya Osoegawa only cares about using magic to live a comfortable life! But now, thanks to the orders from the Divine Magus, the least motivated man in the Magic Realm has been sent to the Human Realm! Can he use his bizarre magic to protect humans and send evil wizards back to their world?!

title: Kane no Naru Mori
description: Rhodri arrives at the elven forest, but it's been overrun by elf-hunting humans! Though an elf himself, he possesses unparalleled worldly wisdom and negotiation skills. But are Rhodri's weapons truly intended for fighting humans...?

title: A long-distance relationship next door
description: The male and female leads, college students, are neighbors. Even though they live right next to each other, they don't encounter each other. But gradually, they acknowledge the other's existence, and fall for each other.

title: Sasha-chan to Classmate Otaku-kun
description:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me "Master"!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)

title: Kizuitara Musou Game No Akuyaku Shougun Datta Ken. ~Hametsu Route Wa Bucchikowasu~
description:
A man working at a black company[1] indulges in his only joy after returning home: playing the musou game[2] "Brave of Kingdom." Suddenly, a strange screen appears, and he finds himself reincarnated in another world!? 
In front of him is Selina, a female lieutenant in military uniform whom he has seen countless times in the game. And upon looking in a mirror what he see is a... muscular, bearded old man? Of all people, he has become the villainous General Zeorg, who is destined to be defeated by the hero! If he continues on like this, this fate awaits him.
 However, having survived the "modern hell" of being a corporate slave, he is unfazed by any tough situation! Armed with his gaming knowledge and corporate slave skills, he becomes the invincible General Zeorg and breaks the path to ruin!!

1: A Japanese originated term denoting a corporation infamous for exploiting its work force.
2: A sub-genre of hack and slash games where overpowered player characters slaughters hordes of weak NPC units and duels stronger named characters on a series of mostly open ended maps. (For e.g. the Dynasty Warriors series)

title: Beyblade X
description: What has not yet been seen, and what cannot be seen - "X". Beyblade, accelerated to the limit (extreme), blasts through a new era!

title: Raising an Eggplant Girl Using Online Polls
description: An eggplant raising(?) manga where online polls decide the outcome.

title: Touhou Chireikiden - Hansoku Tantei Satori
description:
The fifth official Touhou manga (and the first webcomic) written by ZUN and originally drawn by Ginmokusei. 

Touhou Chireikiden focuses on Satori Komeiji's endeavors as a detective, solving mysteries around Gensokyo.

*Serialization was paused for a few months after volume 2 was finished due to the health concerns of the original artist Ginmokusei. The series resumed serialization with Yuu Akimaki as the new artist.*

- **Links:**
[Manga on NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44569)
[Touhou Web Blog](https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/)

- **New serialisation:**
[Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0BQ5KZHYV)
[Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/356764/list/)
[EbookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/701436/)

title: Fog Land
description: Fogland, a mysterious international prison, traps Dante Kang a science teacher sent to reform prisoners during a sudden riot, leaving him with only one way to escape: by becoming a leader.

title: Waves Upon Waves
description:
