there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.

A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.

title: Drama Queen
description:
After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable...

(MANGA Plus)

title: Ruri no Houseki
description:
Mineral collecting is a modern-day treasure hunt!

Ruri, a high school girl who loves jewelry and accessories, ventures into the world of mineral collecting in mountains, rivers, and caves. The first volume features numerous minerals, including quartz, garnet, pyrite, gold sand, and fluorite. The collection scenes are full of fascinating scenes using specialized tools such as a panning dish, hammer, and topographical maps. This is an authentic science adventure based on the solid knowledge of the author, who is trained in mineralogy!

title: Itsumo Baka ni shitekuru Bishoujo-tachi to Zetsuen shitara, Jitsu wa Ore no Koto ga Daisuki Datta you da.
description:
"I want to break up with you." 

In the winter of his first year of high school. Yuta Miyamoto, who tries to be "kind to others," was told by his girlfriend, Yumi Asakawa, that she had to break up with him. While he is still recovering from his broken heart, Akane Kurosaki, a junior, calls him "unable to get a girlfriend," and Ruriri, his favorite maid, calls him "like a slave". Yuta, fed up with the situation, declares his intention to break off relations with all three, but the reaction is not what he expected!

title: Meido Daigaku Genzou Seminar
description:
Human beings have formed societies and created various civilizations on Earth.

At the same time, there have always been strange, unknowable entities that have slipped through the cracks, avoided the light of civilization, and festered in the shadows—gathering stagnation and decay.

Though born from human emotions and will, these entities were never understood, never named, and even now continue to lurk and squirm in the darkness of modern society.

They are information-based lifeforms.

Humanity calls them “phantoms.”

The most terrifying urban legend seminar—now in session!

title: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita
description: Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct. He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...?

title: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki
description: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

title: Mieruko-chan
description:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and... ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](http://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)

title: Loser Fox
description: This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.

title: Hitoribocchi no Isekai Kouryaku
description:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!

title: Skeleton Office
description: After graduating from university, new member of society Moriya Mamoru begins working at city hall. However, it turns out to be an "underground" city hall used by various races known as "demi-humans"...!?

title: Out
description: 17-year-old Iguchi Tatsuya has just been released from juvenile detention and is on probation. He's been relocated to a new area, away from the bad influence of his old friends, and is under the care of his aunt. He is determined not to be sent back to lockup, and he works hard in his aunt's restaurant. However, he still has the same personality, the same tendency to violence, and still falls in with the same sort of people. It's going to be difficult for him to stay out of trouble.

title: Wú Guīzé Shìjiè · again piān
description:
A regular high school girl loses her way en route to a friend’s birthday party, only to stumble into a twisted realm where wishes are granted through bloodshed. Her escape becomes a surreal nightmare: endless misfortunes, a mysterious guardian, and a crimson sky frozen in eternal dusk. As she glimpses the world’s hidden face, will the joy of survival crumble beneath the weight of a brutal truth?

“Do you have a wish you’d kill to make real?” The demon with violet eyes raises its gun. “There is no such thing as kindness.” “Welcome to: the Lawless World.”

title: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon - Elma OL Nikki
description: Some people live to work, others work to live. But Elma works to... eat! Elma is a Harmony Dragon who came to the human world to bring fellow dragon Tohru back home. In order to stay close to Tohru, Elma has taken a job as an office lady (OL). This charming new series from the world of Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid follows the 9-to-5 adventures of Elma as she learns to work and eat her way through the OL life. From mixed-up mixers to death marches, Elma learns that being an OL is just as hard as being a dragon...

title: Hooked on Captain Charming
description: One day, Mia, a mermaid with big dreams of romance, is reeled out of water by Jack, the coarse captain of the Heaven Pirates. To her disappointment, Jack looks nothing like the blond Prince Charming of her dreams, but Mia can't help but find herself mesmerized.

title: Yuureitou
description:
In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!

title: Kurozakuro
description: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat… humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?

title: Cerberus
description: Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!

title: Amateur Vigilante
description: Action thriller about an obsessed lonely man with a delusional plot to save Japan by assassinating a politician. But his twisted plan is disturbed when he witnesses a young girl next door getting abducted by the Yakuza. He decides to save her but his attempt ends in a chaotic massacre where he manages to kill the gangsters. But things only get worse from here on out, now he's getting hunted down by even more ruthless killers.

title: Homebodies
description:
"Home is where the heart is."

Today, once again, the day sprawls out before us. Happy days, and not-so-happy days - no matter what, here at home you're always wrapped in the warmth of your favorite place. It's the little things: the small joys, scattered all about, that make everyday life worth living.

A full-color collection of vignettes about daily life at home, presented by popular illustrator Ida Chiaki..

title: Welcome to Rose Mansion
description:
"Welcome to the Rose Mansion. This letter has been written to assist you in leading a safe and peaceful life in the manor for the coming year. Please make an effort to fully acquaint yourself with the following rules at your earliest convenience, and adhere to them as a matter of utmost priority under any circumstances. Bear in mind that you will bear full responsibility for any consequences resulting from the violation of these rules. "

Life plummeted in an instant after her father’s death. She struggled desperately, even amidst her mother’s extravagance and the mounting debts that they could not overcome.

“Mother, are you… are you really suggesting I be sold to a man older than you right now?”

Yet, everything collapsed with just one sentence from her mother. Then, an offer to become a tutor came from the wealthiest and most prestigious household of the kingdom, House Otis. She had no choice but to accept.

“Welcome to the most fragrant tomb in the world, Miss Richelle Howard. Let’s be good, amicable corpses together.”

A mansion covered in roses. The dazzlingly beautiful Otis family. Within it, strange incidents began, slowly tightening their grip around her neck. Now, it’s time to face the consequences of her choice.

"We sincerely hope you have a safe and enjoyable year. Let’s have fun together."

title: 10-nenkan Tomodachi dato Omotteta Otokonoko ni Kokuhaku Sareru Ohanashi
description:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again... What a waste!

"No, because I love you."

...Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn...!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

title: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World
description: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"

title: Märchen Crown
description: Rapunzel is a young girl who lives atop a tall tower and knows nothing of the outside world. One day she meets a boy named Mikel, who climbs the tower, and their destiny to change the world begins to unfold!

title: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" o Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsu wa Densetsu no Ansatsusha
description: Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly "kills" the demon king. After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn't thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated: Live an ordinary life. And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.

title: Yuusha Party ni Kawaii Ko ga Ita no de, Kokuhaku Shite Mita
description: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...

title: Hellper 2 <KillBeros>
description: Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

title: Heion Sedai no Idaten-tachi
description:
Hayato is a young deity with a foul mouth who has always heard legends about Demons that were sealed away about 800 years ago. Follow the epic saga of several young deities, who end up having to fight demons, humans and overcome several challanges.  
  
  
A remake of a web manga of the same name with new art by Cool-Kyou Shinja.

title: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei
description: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.

title: My Bias Gets On The Last Train
description:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

title: Back to Spring
description: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
description: A story about 28-year-old salaryman Haru Ikeda and his new girlfriend Taya.

title: Texts of the Three Kingdoms
description: A brand new way of interpreting the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms", where we find the characters with a modern look with access to phones and internet. A mix of history, fiction with contemporary technology.

title: The Youngest Is Preventing the End of the World
description:
"The stupid youngest one, the one who doesn't know how to do anything, but causes trouble with her cute face."

Exasperated, I looked in the mirror once again and exclaimed, "Why am I the 'stupid youngest one' Diana Cartier!"

In the novel *The Ending Can't Be the Destruction of the World*, Diana is an evil woman who repeatedly commits evil deeds and is brainwashed by the villain, contributing greatly to the destruction of the world! If something could go wrong for the villainess, it will. But when something went wrong for me, I recalled my past life instead? As an ordinary college student in my past life, I made up my mind when I realized that I had been reincarnated as Diana Cartier, the villainess in the novel.

"The world is going to end. But I'm not going to let it happen."

Yes, I will prevent the end of the world with my own hands! And save my brothers from the conspiracy at the same time! Wait a minute. What's that pitch black thing sprawled out on the floor over there? Wait. That face, where have I seen it before? 

'Is that Linus del Stein?!'

Why are you lying there, Mr. Protagonist of the novel who will destroy this world?

Diana and her brothers are trying their best to stop the end of the world! And cute animals and other stuff? Our sweet youngest is preventing the end of the world, get out of the way!

title: GaCen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
description: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

title: Isekai Kara Kita Elf to Tomo ni Sugosu Nichijou
description:
"I'm going to start living with an elf!"

Oribe Eiichi, a young man without a job and at the bottom of his life, picks up a mysterious stone in the park one day. When he opens his eyes, he finds himself on top of a giant tree with a beautiful elf in his arms! Eichi tries to save her, but he falls from the tree and loses consciousness.

When he wakes up in the hospital a short time later, he finds Kurokawa, who claims to be a public security officer, and the elf Tia.

There he learns a shocking truth...

title: Geu Angnyeo ga Geom eun Deun Yuyu
description:
Erin suffered her entire life from the abuse of the Marchioness and the malicious rumors she spread, until she finally died.

After two reincarnations, she returned as a genius Sword Master.

This time, everything will be different.

---
"Your Majesty wants you to hear this. Your family will soon follow you."

Murdered after years of abuse and false accusations from her stepmother. Thought it was over, after two reincarnations, she returned to her original self, Erin Rexus, known as the greatest villainess. Before losing everything and even losing her loved ones.

"I know there are things you can't tell me. When you're ready, tell me."

The kind and compassionate Second Prince, Ferdin Rexus. When she returned to the past and faced him again, she vowed to herself. She would save him. Even if it meant becoming a true villainess.

title: The Person I Was Meeting Was a Kidnapper
description: After gaining her long-awaited fox form (but losing her human shape), a white fox beastkin escapes kidnapping, only to face her captor again at a mandatory royal matchmaking. The wolf who once dragged her away now sits across the tea table, smirking.

title: I Ended Up Raising the Seed of Evil
description:
Reborn as a character fated to die at the hands of the final boss, she tries to change destiny by raising the future villain herself. 

But instead of salvation, her plan backfires her once-innocent ward grows into an obsessive man who won’t let her out of his sight.

Did she raise the evil god… or just create a new problem?

title: Longtime Red Mall
description: Reformed gangster, Nam Geonho decides to open an adult sex toy shop with Yeonwoo, his most beloved hoobae, after getting out of prison. Geonho had hoped that opening the shop in the countryside would allow him peace and quiet but interest in the shop soars and customers surge. To provide good recommendations to the increasing number of customers, Geonho decides to try the toys on himself but as he struggles with them, Yeonwoo walks in. When Yeonwoo decides to help Geonho, a sudden strange atmosphere descends and…..

title: How to Survive as the Daughter of the Emperor Who Killed Me
description:
Betrayed and slain by the man she once loved, she begs a dragon to grant her the strength to protect her daughter. Her wish is answered but not in the way she expected. 

Returned by fate in a strange and twisted form, she must now fight to change her tragic destiny and guard what truly matters.

title: Make Sure You Regret It
description: For Olivia Madeleine, illegitimate daughter of a duke, her only hope of a better life away from her cold-hearted family is her betrothal to arrogant crown prince Leoford Franz. When the revelation of his tryst with another debutante comes as an unsurprising wake-up call, she has no choice but to barter for her freedom with Edwin Lowell Vikander, the ruthless, war-hardened Grand Duke of the north. As her dangerous dance with Edwin begins, Olivia seeks to leave her former fiancé with the coldest gift that vengeance can impart… A heart made bitter with regret.

title: Rock wa Lady no Tashinami deshite
description:
Lilisa Suzunomiya, who is forced to live a cramped life at a girl's school where genuine ladies gather, 
is drawn to the sounds coming from the old school building...
The gorgeous and ladylike girls will shout with beautiful sparks!

title: Sakigake no Hana Miko
description: There is a group of beautiful girls who fight against the "gods of calamity" who bring misfortune to people. They are called "flower shrine maidens" and live together in the "Night District Castle". Arata, a mere part-time high school teacher, decides to become the chief of the flower shrine maidens after the death of his father. However, organizing a group of flower shrine maidens full of unique and problematic characters is more difficult than he imagined...

title: Mushoku Tensei: Roxy da tte Honki desu
description:
A prequel spinoff depicting Roxy's early life!
  
Having discovered that she has been born without her race's racial ability, Roxy went through a childhood of isolation, but her chance meeting with a magician broadened her horizons. What awaited the young girl that, looking for freedom, left her hometown was…!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shirotaka](https://mangadex.org/author/38c0c039-c347-42fa-a196-3d0315451b4c)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/31808)

title: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan
description:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

“You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.”

Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!

title: Petals of Reincarnation
description: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

title: Urekko Mangaka X Utsubyou Mangaka
description:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).

title: The Perfect Hybrid
description: Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension, and it has been a few years since peace was restored, thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu, our protagonist, was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent, however, is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.

title: Tonari no Gal wa Kuchisabishii-chan
description:
The story of a gyaru with ravenous cravings and the loner who sits next to her.

----

These are the promotional PIXIV originals for the serialized manga of the same name.

title: The Baengri Clan's Unwanted Granddaughter
description:
Yeon was just an orphan on the streets when a man claiming to be her father brought her to his family home. But the Baengri estate was a den of vipers that swallowed her whole, and it's only when she's standing at the funeral of the father she never truly understood that she realizes how familiar this story is. When she wakes up six years old again, Yeon knows she can't waste her second chance. This time, she's going to save her father. This time, she's going to live without regrets.

---
Here, inside this martial arts novel, there is a true teacher who teaches the arrogant male lead and awakens him through death. Handsome, good-natured, righteous, strong, and… Anyway, there was one big flaw in the male lead's damn fine teacher. It was his foolish only daughter who was filled with greed. A tenacious villainous extra, who always comes back to haunt the male lead in every way, but cannot be abandoned because she is his teacher's daughter. Throughout reading the novel, I cursed at that daughter. Saying that if it were me, I wouldn't live like that.

'But that didn't mean that I wanted to be her!'

What was worse, Father has already died, and my reputation was the worst. Inevitably, I ran away, but… I died. However, when I opened my eyes, Father was alive?!

'If so, in this life, I will definitely save Father!'

However…

"To think they’re aiming for my granddaughter?! I'll kill them all!"

Why do I see Grandfather, who doesn't even appear many times throughout the novel, so often like this?

"Marriage? No. Yeonie said that she would live by my side for the rest of her life."

Even Father, somehow became weird. Moreover:

"Why do you keep avoiding me? Is this also my mistake?"

Isn't the main character suddenly becoming obsessed with me?

"Originally, I was destined to die. Until you came here."

I saved the time-limited bastard, but isn’t it that no good deed goes unpunished?

"At least when I'm in front of you… I don't think I’m trash."

The villain who blew off my neck is suddenly trying to repent.

Is it really okay if it's like this?

title: Jikken Ningyou Dummy Oscar
description: Shunsuke Tokyo, a talented Japanese engineer with a strong passion for doll-making, has been invited to join the West German automobile manufacturer Volkswagen as an experimental doll maker. Despite the initial differences between the company's doll requests and Shunsuke's creative vision, he successfully bridged this gap by producing incredibly intricate experimental dolls!

title: Man! Sea of ​​Japan
description: Kai Nihonkai, a high school student living in a rural town, tries to run away from the town with Yuki, a woman who is about to be forced into a political marriage, but the chase ends in failure. Nihonkai, who has become uncomfortable in his hometown due to the eloping scandal, cuts off the relationship with his father, who is the chief priest of the temple, and leaves his hometown alone to meet various women.

title: Quánzhí Fǎshī
description:
Our hero, Mo Fan, inherits a magical necklace—the next day, he wakes up to find that the world has changed. His high school now teaches magic, and students are encouraged to try and become accomplished magicians. A world that ran on science now runs on magic. However, some things are still the same. He still has a teacher who sees him as a hopeless student, classmates who look the same, a father who struggles to make ends meet, and a not-by-blood little sister who can't walk on her own.
However, Mo Fan discovers that the vast majority of magicians can only harness one element of magic. As luck would have it, however, he is an exception—a versatile mage!

(Source: WebNovel)


---

title: Estio
description:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

title: Mato Seihei no Slave
description:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"... and it's not him who has to pay it.

title: Vagabond
description:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.

title: Chie-sensei wa Mienai
description: Chie-sensei works at a certain kindergarten. She enjoys taking care of her class, but one thing is bothering her: her kindergarteners see something that she herself cannot...

title: Shinobi Undercover
description:
Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official English:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/shinobi-undercover)
- [Official X](https://x.com/shinobigoto_off)

title: Tougen Anki
description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

title: Ruri Dragon
description:
Ruri faces the usual high school issues: pushy classmates, annoying teachers, and… waking up with dragon horns?!

Just after starting high school, Ruri gets hit with the biggest reveal of her life—she’s a dragon! Well, a half dragon.
Her mom admits Ruri inherited her draconic traits from her father, who, yes, is actually a dragon.

As if dealing with curious classmates wasn’t already challenging enough, Ruri and her dragon genes literally turn up the heat in the middle of a lecture.
Her life is about to be anything but ordinary!

(Source: Viz Media, edited)

title: [Kamikai] Ikemen Haishinsha ni Ria Totsu Shitemita
Nick & Lever
description:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!

title: Gazing at the Azure
description:
Long, long ago, there were two orphan brothers, Ogna and Syra. To make a living, they spend their days tending to the fields and raising silkworms. One day, the younger brother, Syra, starts to be concerned about beauty and what it means to be beautiful, much to his older brother's chagrin. A rift begins to form between the two brothers when Syra encounters someone in a lake, someone who loves him for his beauty...

Serialized in *June*, this one-shot has never been reprinted or collected in any tankobon.

title: I Am a Hero
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page

title: From Monday to Weekend
description:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

title: Glamorous Fellows!
description:
A short story anthology featuring a great many "glamorous" bodies.

---
001 - **[Kaoru Mori] Ame-no-Uzume**: A glimpse at part of the myth of Amaterasu, focusing on Ame-no-Uzume's dance in front of the gods.
002 [冨明仁] フワリンモーニン
003 - **[Kanae Yamade] Thin & Thicc** (included in [Madowaseru Onnatachi](https://mangadex.org/title/87099c34-8946-4d76-8a6e-07ae02fc0936/dazed-and-confused))
004 - **[Ryoko Kui] How to Be That Girl**: Learning to come to terms with an LGBTQ sibling.
005 - **[Hirona Takahashi] Legend of Yuhime** (included in [Glamorous Gathering Takahashi](https://mangadex.org/title/12b6736f-6620-4e10-9c26-5d4128de2111/glamorous-gathering-takahashi))
006 [志岐佳衣子] にゅうげーむ
007 [松本水星] MISS.ほほかべ図書館の魔力
008 [宮永麻也] スミレちゃんとコウタくん
009 [八重樫莉子] 僕だけのポートレー卜
010 [真冬麻里] デッサンの時間
011 [サワミソノ] 空が飛べるだけ
012 [町馬順子] セクシー ドラッグ
013 [なかま亜咲] 落ちオチまっぱ
014 [設楽清人] アラジン
015 [戎島実里] ホラー映画撮影
016 - **[Ohtake Masao] 90 59 88** (included in [Madowaseru Onnatachi](https://mangadex.org/title/87099c34-8946-4d76-8a6e-07ae02fc0936/dazed-and-confused))
017 [川田大智] ヒッチハイク
018 [緒方波子] 恋と肉
019 [山高守人] ドロップ&グラマラス
020 [佐藤春美] 特権的肉体についての考察
021 [中西芙海] 探究者、その名はカー夕ー
022 [二宮香乃] リリスの悪魔的生活
023 [浅井海奈] ぽんぽこ!
024 [須川佳] 太陽の子どもたち
025 [富岡二郎]  かなえて！イヌ松さま  憧れのボディー！の巻
026 [原鮎美] 怪盗インス夕 グラマラス
027 [上瀬達也 ] グラマラスで いこう！
028 [高江洲弥 ] カガミの国
029 - **[Lun Lun Yamamoto] Lovely Little Red Riding Hood**: Yamamoto presents Little Red Riding Hood, but with a deadly twist.
030 [比嘉史果] うけもちの神
031 [佐々大河] 玉華のチャイナドレス
032 - **[Hirona Takahashi] Discarded Glamorous** (included in [Glamorous Gathering Takahashi](https://mangadex.org/title/12b6736f-6620-4e10-9c26-5d4128de2111/glamorous-gathering-takahashi))

- One of two special bonus books that you could receive if you sent in a ticket included with Harta 50-52.

title: Hajimete desu wa!: Okumi Ojousama wa Hinako-chan o Beta Homeru
description:
"Your lunch, Shimoya-san? Pathetic~!"

Poor high school girl Hinako Shimoya lives in poverty and is left all alone in class because of it. But when the ultra-rich heiress Okumi Kanamori takes a bite of Hinako's homemade lunch, her delighted cry of "This is my first time~!" echoes through the room. A clash of poverty and privilege— as the two girls share more and more "first times" together, a friendship that money can't buy begins to blossom in this offbeat school comedy.

Source: Comipo (Translated)

title: Shinozaki-kun no Mente Jijou
description:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!

title: Usagi Wa Kaku Katariki
description: The city of Shibugaya was once known for its youth and bustle, however now, all that remains are ruins since man-eating rabbits have made a nest of its subway... One wolf-eared girl dares to challenge the underground with by her side a girl with rabbit ears...

title: Otokodakedo Shinigami Hime no Yome ni Narimashita (Kari)
description: "From now on, you are wedded to me." When I was reincarnated into a strange world, I was captured by villagers and dressed as a woman to be the sacrificial bride to the God of Death. When I was brought to the Death God's castle, what I found was a beautiful girl with no housekeeping skills. A story about isekai newlywed life with a fearsome goddess x girl!

title: Saikyou Ansatsusha, Class Ten'i de Isekai e
description:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.

title: Kingdom
description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.
___
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

Parution: Weekly Young Jump
___
**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)

title: Yomei Ichinen to Senkokusareta Boku ga, Yomei Hantoshi no Kimi to Deatta Hanashi
description:
"It was the happiest day in the world."
Our sad and fleeting "love with a deadline" has begun.

In the winter of his freshman year of high school, Akito Hayasaka is diagnosed with a heart disease and told that he has little time left to live. In the midst of despair, Akito meets Sakurai Haruna, who is hospitalized at the hospital. Haruna, too, is seriously ill and has only a few days left to live. Akito begins to talk with her, hiding his illness, and becomes interested in Haruna, who says she is not afraid of dying. Can I still be in love with her? The days that pass by as he asks himself these questions begin to change?

title: Joshi Koukousei no Nichijou
description: Rather than love stories, we get excited over ghost tales; rather than Instagram-worthy meals, we devour piled-high dishes; even if online comments are harsh, we still crave that buzz...In the Reiwa era, high school girls—embrace diversity.

title: El juego de intimidación de Miss Vampire
Spy Crocodile Bird
description: A secret organization, Crocodile, a private intelligence agency under the National Intelligence Service (NIS). A freelance spy working there, codenamed Crocodile Bird. Fight against the NIS, which seeks to kill your father and swallow up the organization!

title: Saunoa!
description: The story centers on Kokage, a high school girl who doesn't really like bathing, at least not in traditional Japanese baths. She meets a Finnish exchange student, Lyydia, and reluctantly ends up going to the sauna with her. The group also is joined by Serika, a self-proclaimed sauna-otaku, and Maki, whose parents run a super-sento (bathhouse).

title: Make-upper
description: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!

title: Akanabe-sensei wa Tereshirazu
description: Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her...

title: She Seems To Be Teasing Me
description:
Yu Chaoyan, who became wildly popular with her performance in Black and Red, is as well known for her various rumors as she is for her fame. However, in reality, she is just a girl with a poisonous mouth. Recently, Yu Chaoyan was angered by a male actor's linked publicity stunts, and in a fit of rage, she powerfully challenged him on live cameras:

"If this world only had this man, I would rather date a woman"

This bold statement immediately exploded into the hot polls and caused a huge uproar. As a result of this, Yu Chaoyan was attacked in the parking lot by the male actor's fanatical fans who were lying in wait. At the moment of danger, Yu Chaoyan was heroically saved by Yin Zhou, who entered by mistake after taking the wrong path…

title: Ore no Kingdom
description: A boy awakens "the Voice of the Conqueror," a holy power that allows absolute control over all females.

title: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather
description: After getting rejected by her fiancé, 20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.

title: Mamono no Mori no Shojo Nova
description: Nova, a spirited young girl who was raised by monsters in the forest, has one big wish—she wants to use the earth's blessing known as "Magia." However, it seems there is a secret about Nova that only Cerberus, the leader of the forest, knows... Unaware of this hidden truth, Nova continues to run happily and innocently through the forest today.

title: Hen'ai Café
description: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.

title: Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai
description: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out... it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!!

title: Axioma Vetiti
description:
As a result of a successful campaign on Catarse, Axioma Vetiti is a Brazilian work of dark fantasy that chronicles the revenge journey of Yana, a warrior as mysterious as the relic she wields, and Beatrice, one of the most prominent Axioms of her time.
The two walk side by side, driven by their shared vendetta: to eliminate the existence of all those who proclaimed themselves Gods.

Using its own magic system, called Teorema, the comic delivers frenetic and fluid action, balancing it with questions about human existence and the nature of things.

(Source: Amazon Brazil, edited)
___
### Links
* [Amazon Brazil](https://www.amazon.com.br/dp/B0CTKF3SM3)

title: Meiten Restaurant
description: As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate, Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day, he suddenly got hit by a truck, and when he awoke, he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There, he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant), where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...

title: Bouncer -Tokyo Fist-
description:
Jouichirou Shishido, a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part-time jobs. One night, he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night, members of a private security firm known as “Tokyo Fist”, which ends up changing his life.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/bouncer-tokyo-fist)

title: Yuru Camp△
description:
Rin, a girl camping by herself at the base of Mt. Fuji. Nadeshiko, a girl who came to see Mt. Fuji on her bicycle. The scenery the two witness over a supper of cup ramen marks the start of a new friendship and many adventures to come, camping in the great outdoors!  

  ---

  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/yurucamp_anime)  
- [Official Drama Twitter](https://twitter.com/yurucamp_drama)  
- [Official Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yurucamp_insta/)  
- [Official Drama Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yurucamp_drama/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](https://yurucamp.jp/)  
- [Official Drama (JP)](https://www.tv-tokyo.co.jp/yurucamp/)

title: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary
description: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary (バンドリ！ガールズバンドパーティ！ イベントダイアリー) is a comicalization of the event stories from the game Girls Band Party! by Kurobuchi Kashiko.

title: Munou Nintei de Bouken Mono Kubi ni Natta kara Jimoto ni Kaette Kekkon Suru ~Kekkon Aite ga Sekai wa Horoboshi Kaketa Ryuo no Musume de Ore no Nouryoku ga Kakusei Shita~
description: Judged for having no chance of getting a skill, Alex gave up on his dreams of becoming an adventurer and put his days in a guild behind him. Upon returning to his hometown, he was approached by his childhood friend, Heroine Nadja, who proposed her hand in marriage. The two then decided to spend the rest of their lives in peace. But then, a flock of monsters attacks their town...

title: Kanojo wo CharaMake!
description: Body modification of a cosplaying childhood friend with efficient meals! Full breasts and a toned waist! Create the "ideal heroine" through nutritional balance and calorie management!

title: Servamp
description: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.

title: Cheolhyeolgeomga Sanyanggaeui Hoegwi
description:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title: Shurato: Heavenly Tale - Kurogo no Aitou
Date or Kill ~Himitsu no Matching~
description:
Ayame, a top-notch assassin who has lived 25 years without any connection to romance, is convinced by a colleague to register on a dating app—while hiding her true identity!
She ends up matching with none other than her next target: Murai, the ruthless and cold-hearted young leader of a gang...!?

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
description: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.

title: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto
description: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!

title: Random Chat
description:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3166015)
- Promotional video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YmCRdVGAOPk)
- Songs accompanying the chapters - [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEbYVmn3Vy_q874VMUq41Q/video)

title: Saint Seiya: Saint Mariya
description: Mariya enters Graad Academy and looks forward to her school life. However, something strange occurs in the auditorium due to a mysterious evil action...

title: Makoto-senpai no Mae de wa Kakko Tsukerarenai!
description:
Handsome girl x handsome girl!? A short love comedy set in an all-girls school!

Jun, a handsome girl character, is popular at the all-girls school.
To stay true to her character, she tries to live her life in a stylish and gentlemanly way, but whenever she's in trouble, the "true handsome girl", Makoto-senpai always appears...?
A short love comedy between two handsome girls!

title: Doro no Bunzai de Watashi dake no Taisetsu wo Ubaouda Nante
description: Protect the girl who is destined to die an untimely death. That is the mission given to me and my senpai from the heavenly realm. How is it a job... to come down to earth and protect stupid human beings? Moreover, protecting an ordinary girl...? Why do we, beautiful angels, have to do such a thing! Senpai must have been thinking that way all along. I believed that, but why that kind of--?

title: Dokagui Daisuki! Mochizuki-san
description: Mochizuki Mikoto, 21 years old, sales office worker! Her happiness as a gentle and soft-spoken girl is... binge eating!?!? She eats hearty, thick, mountainous portions of food without stopping. It's a devilish pleasure that can only be obtained by skyrocketing her blood sugar levels.

title: Hen na E
description:
Sasaki, a member of an occult club, is told by his junior colleague Kurihara about the existence of a certain blog. The blog has many “pictures” drawn by the blogger's wife, “Yuki”. A chilling story that unravels the mystery hidden in nine pictures! When the mystery is solved, all the incidents will be connected.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/uketsu_hennae)

title: Kumamiko
description: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

title: Imaizumin-chi wa Douyara Gal no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii ~DEEP~
description: During the day, Imaizumi attends his classes like any dutiful student, only to return each evening to a home full of hotties! It seems his home has become the go-to hangout for the coolest gyarus in town. From endless gossip fests to snack binges to getting downright physical with his three new housemates, his once-quiet abode is now buzzing with non-stop energy and exciting escapades. Can Imaizumi keep up with the lively antics of his lusty gal pals?

title: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
description:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: Maji de Tsukiau 15-fun Mae
description: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?

title: Morning Glow is Golden: The IDOLM@STER
description: The spinoff manga centers on the character Kotori Otonashi, an office clerk at 765 Production, during her high school days.

title: I Am the Fated Villain
description:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

title: Shikatanaki Koui
description: A work drawn to be submitted to COM's reader submissions corner, Gra-Com, in 1967, but which was later never published.

title: Yakutatazu no Takaramono
description: Collection of short stories.

title: Isekai Ojisan
description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

title: Maitsuki Niwa-tsuki Ooya-tsuki
description: Asako moves to a new house to get over her recent breakup. She finds a great little place a bit removed from the city with a lovely garden, but there’s a catch—the house also comes with a live-in landlord!

title: Abnormal-kei Joshi
description: High schooler Shiina Shinya thinks that all girls are pretty much good-for-nothing, mostly because he doesn't understand them at all. That doesn't stop him from being surrounded by strange girls! Tsubasa Tooka, a cute, much-admired girl, stalks him. Shikimura Masami is majorly into masochism, and has recruited Shinya into her play sessions. Ikari Satsuki seems suspiciously interested in the recent serial stabbings, and seems to want to drag Shinya into it. Banjou Yoruko, a normally quiet, bookish girl, has decided she and Shinya are bound up in some fantasy setting. Uchida Yumeji is the school's sleeping beauty, who spends all of her time in the infirmary because she requires so much sleep. Shinya brings her newspapers, so she can keep up with current events in the short time she spends awake. Lastly, Okui Akane is convinced she is a vampire. For all Shinya knows, it could be true, but in practice it just means that he has to let her drink his blood. How will Shinya deal with all these good-for-nothing girls that complicate his life?

title: The King of Fighters 2000
description: Based on the 2D fighting game series King of Fighters. King of Fighters is a battle between the strongest teams in the world, the teams are composed of 4 since the King of Fighters'99 tournament, also the hero since KoF'99 has changed to K'. The story follows K' starting from 9 months after KoF'99 and his entry into the King of Fighters 2000 tournament.

title: One-Punch Man (Webcomic)
description: Follows the life of an average part-time hero who manages to win every battle with a single punch. This ability frustrates him as he no longer feels the thrill of fighting a tough opponent, which leads him to question his past desire of becoming strong.

title: Uchi ni Kaeru to Itsumo Kukkoro ga Iru
description: A high school student planning to live alone decides to rent a "stigmatized property" where the ghost of a female knight appears!

title: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onnanoko.
description: Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!

title: Nibanme na Boku to Ichiban no Kanojo
description:
Minamino Chinatsu is a beautiful girl who's incredibly popular and easygoing. Ever since I met her in the fall of my first year of high school, my life has been anything but ordinary. It all changed when another guy with the same name as me showed up at school – a handsome one, no less – and suddenly my classmates started calling me 'Number Two.'

"You're not 'Number Two' to me," she said. "Besides, it's me who wants to kiss you first."

My relationship with Chinatsu goes beyond just school. We play street basketball after class, cook meals together, share secrets, and even grow physically closer. I thought I was fine being alone, but she accepts me for who I am. And because of that, I want to give her the same in return.

This is a coming-of-age love story about realizing how precious even the simplest desires can be.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: Shachou to Sake to Hoshi
description: After the sudden death of her father, 24-year-old Reina Izutsu finds herself at the helm of the family business, Izutsu Printing. Thrust into the role of company president, the pressure quickly hardens her demeanor—leaving her employees walking on eggshells, especially Kenichi Ishizumi, the stoic 37-year-old section chief. One night, overwhelmed and tipsy in a quiet park, Reina blurts out, "That's it! I quit being everyone's boss!"—completely unaware that the man beside her is her employee. Under the soft glow of the stars, he listens silently... and makes a quiet vow to stand by her side.

title: Ano Kiss wo Tadotte
description: At the place where 20-year-old Kota works, a college student starts working as a part-timer for the summer. His name is Chizuru, a boy Kota never wanted to see again. They were classmates in junior high, and were forced to kiss each other in a punishment game. Chizuru must hate him, but for some reason, he tries to kiss Kouta whenever he gets a chance! What's more he says that he came to work here just so he could see Kota again!?

title: The God Before Me
description: Lately, Odachi has been struggling with a lack of confidence in his play. Since his debut match, where he faced off against the “God” of shogi, something has changed within him. Will the day come when he can surpass the God of his generation? A tale of a self-proclaimed average shogi player, his friends, peers, and rivals, and the God before him.

title: Harukaze Mound
description: "We twins were born on the same day and share the same dream! And we've made a promise to each other!" Nobody's more passionate about baseball than the Kuzumi twins. Younger brother Aokaze and his golden right arm is a once in a generation talent! Older brother Nagiharu is a lefty bench warmer. These two have walked the same dream since birth, but when they meet a certain catcher, their destinies will begin to change. The creators of Phantom Seer bring you a serious baseball epic!

title: Nue no Onmyouji
description: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.

title: Otr of the Flame
description:
The world is encased in winter due to the advances of the Ice Kingdom. Kind-hearted Otr, who dreams of being a warrior like his dad, has been entrusted with keeping the fires burning as a cook in the fortress. But when the fortress is attacked by the demonic army of the Ice Kingdom, the people and the flame are in danger of being snuffed out. Can Otr awaken a power that can turn the tide?

(MANGA Plus)

title: Eunuch of Empire
description:
Eunuchs, the only men allowed to serve in the secret garden known as the harem. When a young eunuch named Jafar encounters three beautiful sisters there, their meeting shakes the country to its foundations!

(MANGA Plus)

title: Me & Roboco
description: The year is 20XX... A time when every household owns cute maid robots known as OrderMaids. Average grade-schooler Bondo dreams of having his very own robot. But what he got was... Unable to compute!!! Life is gonna get a whole lot weirder when Roboco, the most powerful clumsy maid ever created, shows up at his door!

title: Red Cat Ramen
description: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?

title: Kagurabachi
description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.

title: Someone Hertz
description: Mimei shares the hobby of listening to a late-night comedy radio show with the funny and mysterious Kurage from his class. And she's famous for sending in hilarious comments that are read on the show? But Mimei wants to be just as funny as her! Are they friends, are they rivals, are they something more...? This radio rom-com is on the air!

title: Supreme Ocular Master: The Peerless Heiress
description:
"Luo Qingtong, a young lady from the 24th century who ranked first among those with superpowers, miraculously transmigrated into a different world. There, she begins her journey of vengeance as the crippled, oldest daughter of a duke from the lower kingdoms, where villains line up to get face-slapped and scumbags and manipulative bitches wait to get tortured!

An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. She'll exterminate anyone who offends her! All is going well... but then she accidentally gets involved with a man of peerless beauty, whom she attempts to flirt with whenever she's unable to win against him in a fight. From there on, it becomes a story about their romantic pursuits..."

title: Akane-banashi
description: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!

title: Witch Watch
description: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof...

title: Sakamoto Days
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day... he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then... Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger?

title: The Elusive Samurai
description: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Tokiyuki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Tokiyuki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!

title: ONE PIECE
description:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**

title: Haikei, Arishi Hi ni Saku Hanatachi e
description: Kasumi, a serious girl who has just started at an all-girls school, discovers a letter tucked into an old book she found in the library. The letter's writer yearns to have a special relationship with another girl, like how it was described in the book… A romance about the the old-school "S" kind of girls-love.

title: Ore ni Trauma o Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desuga Teokure desu
description: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!

title: Yontou-ryuu no Saikyou Haishin-sha ~Yari Konda VR Game no Settei ge Genjitsu Sekai ni Hanei Sareta node, Haishi Yotei Datta Job de Musou Shimasu~
description:
**Without warning, the real world synced with the game. Towers and dungeons materialized globally—now, conquer them with *Quad-Wielding*!**  

Hayate, a solo player of the ultra-popular VRMMO *FWO*, cherished his obscure class: *Quad-Wielder*. But his world shattered when he received the worst possible news: **"Quad-Wielding will be removed!"**  

Teamed up with Elena, a chaebol heiress and archer, Hayate unleashes his ultimate Quad-Wielding technique *"Obscuring Moon"*—all while unraveling the mysteries of the Creation Goddess. Then suddenly… **the game and reality merge.**

title: Tonikaku Kawaii
description:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.

title: Coppers
description: An overview of the entire precinct and the characters.  A police procedural but it shifts towards their personal, everyday lives. Fairly lighthearted takes on the lives of a group of cops working out of a precinct in the Bronx, with a running commentary on the importance of doughnuts.

title: Visual Breakers
description:
We ended up at a concept bar on a whim for the afterparty, and it turned out to be full of seriously tall women.

It’s a manga where the customers have a casual conversation with the big ladies they meet at the bar.
The conversations mostly revolve around appearances and the relationship dynamics between people.

title: Boita Boine
description: Haine is a boyish tomboy highschool girl who wants her very own yuri harem. She gets confident after helping a girl on the first day of school, but standing in the way of her goal is Shizuka, another boyish highschool girl who's seen as a prince and steals girls' hearts without even trying! Haine's new goal is to defeat Shizuka and build her yuri harem! A yuri comedy full of ruthlessness and bickering between two rival tomboys!

title: Hametsu Flag Kaihi no Tame Yamaoku e Hikikomotteita Saikyou no Akuyaku wa, Tasuketa Heroine ni Yotte Omotebutai e Tatasareru
description: Alba is happy living a quiet life deep in the mountains... until the day he accidentally saves a beautiful girl — an act that shatters his plans completely. As fate would have it, this girl is one of the key characters responsible for his death in the game's original story! Now dragged into the elite academy where the game unfolds, Alba must dodge danger at every turn if he wants to stay alive.

title: Love Interest Zone
description: Myungha Tae is going to die in 300 days. Well… maybe. After getting sucked into his friend’s novel, "Love Interest Zone," 29-year-old Myungha becomes a 19-year-old high schooler again with one mission—make Yeowoon Cha happy or die. With only 300 days to succeed, Myungha must break past Yeowoon’s barriers and prevent him from experiencing the same tragic fate as he did in the novel. But with Yeowoon’s favorability toward him in the negatives, will he be able to survive?

title: Isekai Mou Kaeritai
description:
Ordinary salaryman X isekai = a dispirited life in another world!?
He worked normally, ate normally, and slept normally. Salaryman Shimoyamaguchi Ichirou was satisfied with his simple but happy everyday life.
One day, he was summoned to another world to fight as a hero, but was as well received as a 1-star character pulled in a gacha game...
"Ugh, I just want to go home..."
Which way will tomorrow lead Shimoyamaguchi!?

title: Meikyuu Teikoku no Tsukurikata - Renseijutsushi wa Mazu Risou no Mura wo Kaitaku Shimasu
description:
Nino, an Alchemist, suddenly regains memories of his past life and realizes that the world he lives in is actually the setting of a game he had mastered in his previous life. Even worse, the world is already on track towards a bad ending. 

Determined to avoid the worst outcome, Nino takes action, but he is soon falsely accused and exiled to a remote frontier. However, this village holds a secret that only he knows—there's a hidden dungeon here! 

Now, with the perks of being a reincarnator and his vast knowledge of the game's mechanics, Nino begins his ideal frontier life!

title: Eroi Koto Suru Tame ni Kyonyuu Bishoujo Dorei wo Katta Hazu ga, Oshishou-sama to Shitawa Rete Omotta Toori ni Ikanaku Naru Hanashi
description: Halo is a talented female elf magician who has memories of when she was a man in her previous life, which is why she wishes to make out with a cute girl. Halo decides to buy Filia, a beautiful female slave with big breasts, but things don't go as she expects them to...

title: Ie Tsukuri Skill de Isekai o Ikinobiro
description:
One day, Kurisu, a girl who was born and raised in a remote area, learns that she has the [House Building] skill. When her memories of being Kurisu Niina, a Japanese woman, come back to her, she decides to leave the remote area and become an adventurer.

After a grueling journey, she arrives in the labyrinthine city of Garel, and tries to build her own house and enjoy living alone, but the officials tell her that people from other countries can't even live there permanently. Thinking, "If so, let's make a house where you can travel!", she remodels a used carriage and begins to make an ideal home.

Now begins the story of a girl who lives single-mindedly in a different world where her life depends on her skills!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/49971)

title: Oblivion Battery
description:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!

title: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade
description:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)

title: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou
description:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)

title: Youjo Senki Shokudou
description:
Tanya Degurechaff is a reincarnated Japanese salesman-turned-sociopathic child soldier, forced by the almighty Being X to fight an endless war.   
But soldiers need to eat, too. So join Tanya as she samples fine wartime meals.

title: Babel II: The Returner
description:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

title: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu
description:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop. Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento...

title: Karada wa Jidou, Nakami wa Ossan no Nariagari Bokenki - Satera mo Tsuiteikimasu!
description:
When Satella was young, her parents were killed by monsters. One day while hoping that her peaceful daily life would continue, she met Gray Millard, the third son of a noble family. She was touched by Gray's determination to carve out a future for himself using advanced magic and special skills, despite the harsh punishment his stepmother meted out to him. 

She decides to go on an adventure with Gray, who had his sights set on the world.

title: Toru ni Taranai
