Won the 11th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga.

title: Bury Me
description:
"Please bury me," the boy said before their eyes even met, and ever since then, he has been seeing that boy everywhere - on the way to work, at the restaurant, at home - asking if he would bury him.

He is afraid. He is terrified. But not because there's clearly something wrong with all of this.

It's because he remembers.

He knows there's a reason the boy is asking him this. There's nothing strange about it.

"Please, bury me?" the boy asks again.

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
description: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament... His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He'll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he's human... Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?

title: MoMo -the blood taker-
description:
In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the “Man with two faces”.
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…?
___
**Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)

title: Kanojo no Tomodachi
description: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?

title: Me and My Beast Boss
description: In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans, OL Saki continues to struggle to lose. Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss, but one day she was suddenly called by the company president, Atlas. I'll do my best!

title: Spacedrum
description:
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

title: Dominate the Three Realms
description: Three hundred years ago, he was know as the great Martial Emperor, but the night before his wedding he was betrayed and killed by his fiancee; three hundred years later he is reborn, and this time nothing will be able to stop him from his goal to dominate the three realms!!!

title: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
description: The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited! Yujiro Hanma, the world's strongest creature, vs. Baki Hanma, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

title: A Superstar From Birth
description: After being reborn for the umpteenth time, 7-month-old Lee Seojun finally gets the chance to fulfill his original dream of becoming a superstar actor! Using magic abilities from his past lives, baby Seojun captivates his playmates and becomes an overnight sensation with a viral mukbang video that helps fussy kids eat. Soon, he's shooting a baby food commercial, and his uncle's entertainment company is knocking at his door... but will Seojun be able to keep up the magic to match the demand?

title: Ponkotsu Dai Shuryou-chan to Ossan Sentouin-san.
description: The Evil Secret Organization Gokuark has been destroyed by the heroes. The next Great Leader who barely survived and her henchman Saito start a new life in a run-down apartment. But can the reclusive, clumsy, and yet adorable Great Leader bring Gokuark back to its former glory?

title: Insomnia
description:
20 nights, 20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan, traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.

Included oneshots:
Volume 1: Hanashicha Ikenai (Don't Tell), Kengai Imouto Kaidan (Out of Bounds: Sister Ghost Story) [Story: Kihara Hirokatsu]

title: Amelia no Koukiteki Romance
description:
From Maiu Cafe : Ameli, a model student and class representative in her first year of high school, has her world turned upside down after a month of classes when her secret is uncovered by Haruka, a second-year student with a devilish charm !

Amelia... What’s really hidden behind that pseudonym ?

title: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
description: Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?!

title: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu ~Saikyou Akachan Daibousou~
description: Born to excellent parents, Leus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking! Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!

title: Buta no Fukushuu
description:
After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot Web](https://web.mangahot.jp/works/detail.php?work_code=z_R0185)
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/revenge-of-the-pig-manga/803/)

title: Morumo 1/10
description:
A young high school couple out on a date saw what looked like a falling meteorite, and inside, they discovered a little baby girl! The two of them married and adopted the girl, who they named Morumo, as their own. The only problem with this feel-good story is that now, as a high school freshman, Morumo is 16.4 meters tall!  
  
Morumo still has a pretty happy life. She's popular with locals and tourists alike, and she goes to school everyday with her childhood friend Miharu. Then one day, a mad scientist, who specializes in experimenting on young ladies, injects Morumo with a serum that reduces her to 1/10 of her normal size. Her weight remains the same, so she is super-dense and tough like a superhero. Suddenly, it seems like all the joys of an ordinary life are within her grasp!! Sadly, the serum's effects are temporary and soon Morumo returns to her giant state.  
  
But now that she knows a normal life is possible, Morumo is not going to give up! Even if it means she and Miharu have to allow a mad scientist to experiment on her, surely the ends will be worth the means!

title: Ibitsu
description: A boy went to take his trash out late one night, and found a strange, creepy, gothic-lolita-dressed woman sitting amongst the garbage bags. She asked if he had a little sister, and he answered her, hurrying afterwards back to his apartment. When he looked out the window, she was gone. Who is the strange woman, and why does she give him such a bad feeling?

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans - Steel Moon
description:
The Calamity War that engulfed all of Earth, and the Gundams deployed then which were said to have brought it to an end. 300 years later, some have been hidden, some abandoned.  
  
Argie Mirage, a boy who carries the past of his family's death at the hands of a Gundam, meets Volco Warren, a boy who wishes to rebuild the Gundam his family left behind.  
  
To destroy a Gundam. To rebuild a Gundam. In the midst of the two boys' intersecting fates, the Astaroth will awaken from its 300 year slumber.  
  
Side story set in the Mobile Suit Gundam - Iron Blooded Orphans universe.

title: Katenai Ko
description: Two female classmates engage in a playful game challenge involving games such as poker, shogi etc... with the loser forced to fulfill embarrassing requests. Confident at first, one girl quickly loses each round, leading to increasingly awkward and funny situations.

title: Kurosagi Corpse Delivery Service
description:
Your body is their business!

Five young students at a Buddhist university, three guys and two girls, find little call for their job skills in today's Tokyo... among the living, that is! But all that stuff in college they were told would never pay off — you know, channeling, dowsing, ESP — gives them a direct line to the dead... the dead who are still trapped in their corpses and can't move on to the next reincarnation.

The five form the *Kurosagi* ("Black Heron", their ominous bird logo) *Corpse Delivery Service*: whether suicide, murder, accident, or illness, they'll carry your body wherever it needs to go to free your soul! The kids from Kurosagi can smell a customer a mile away — it's a good thing one of the girls majored in embalming!

title: Tomodachi Nchi No Nechan Ga Kowakute Ii Hito
description:
Satomi Yuuki, a high school boy, stops by his friend's house on his way home from school. He came over to study for a test, but he's instantly intimidated by his friend's older sister. With her flashy hair, glittering nails, and tons of piercings, she looks seriously scary.

However, she ends up making him Calpis, saying, "Gotta have sugar if you're gonna study," and even serves him handmade curry for dinner. One way or another, the sister keeps looking out for him.

This is a story depicting a pure-hearted teenage boy being constantly flustered by his friend's "Scary But Nice" older sister.

title: Scarlet Star
description:
In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone. That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

title: Vampire Savior: The Soul's Lost Child
description:
In the world of Makai, there are horrible monsters that humans fear, called Darkstalkers. Lillith, a fellow Darkstalker, falls to Earth (London) and befriends John. What will he do when he finds out what she is? Will Lillith survive Master Jedah's attacks??  
  
Based on the Vampire Savior installment, from the DarkStalkers video game series produced by CAPCOM.

title: Boku wa Ai o Shoumei Shiyou to Omou.
description: In love and romance, it's all about TECHNOLOGY, and TECHNOLOGY always wins. Watanabe is a young 26-year-old lawyer who fervently believes in pure love and would give everything for his beloved girlfriend. However, reality makes him realize that love isn't the fantasy he's always dreamed of, but rather a game of probabilities and intelligence. Together with Watanabe, you'll learn the latest technology that will make you irresistible to any woman: “Love Engineering”.

title: Moto Maou-sama no Nangoku Slow Life - Buka ni Uragirareta no de, Mofumofu-tachi to Tanoshiku Slow Life suru no Ja
description: Ragurindo Jenerufu Korasoda, the overworked Demon Queen, had enough. After an assassination attempt and a betrayal by her underlings, she faked her death and escaped to a tropical paradise. There, among palm trees and beaches, she found a herd of adorable, fluffy slime creatures. Life as an ex-Demon Queen had never been so sweet.

title: Waves, Listen to me!
description: On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend, Minare Koda ends up providing a massive drunken rant for Matou, the director of a radio station. The next day, she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio, leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However, her drunken rant and the next day's impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!

title: Farmer of Spirits
description: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?

title: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary
description: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!

title: Partners in Crime, Partners in Love
description: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhang, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

title: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu (Pre-Serialization)
description:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)

title: Chao Xia
description: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

title: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?
description:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive "special treatment" from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! 

"I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama..."
"I want to fall in love and conceive his child."
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

title: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
description:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)

title: Gacha Gacha - Secret
description:
Akira Hatsushiba is just your typical, average high school kid . . . until a glitch in a Gacha Gacha video game changes his life forever. Now, every time Akira sneezes, his entire body undergoes a gender-bending switcheroo! That’s right, Akira is always just an achoo away from getting in touch with his feminine side. But it’s not all bad. Akira has had a crush on Yurika Sakuraba ever since he first laid eyes on her. He’s always been too shy, but now that he can change into a girl, Akira finally has a chance to get close to Yurika. Being a girl certainly has its advantages!  
  
Part Two and Volumes 6-16 of Gacha Gacha.   
Part One is known as Gacha Gacha - Capsule and ran as Volumes 1-5.  
  
English OOP from Del Rey ISBN for those who maybe interested in supporting the author.  
Vol 01: 9780345492333  
Vol 02: 9780345493200  
Vol 03: 9780345493217  
Vol 04: 9780345493224  
Vol 05: 9780345493231  
Vol 06: 9780345499172  
Vol 07: 9780345501691  
Vol 08: 9780345501707  
Vol 09: 9780345506719  
Vol 10: 9780345508447  
Vol 11: 9780345515858

title: Takane no Hana wa Midaresaki
description: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends... He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!

title: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending
description: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title "King of Trash" by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!

title: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu
description:
Minato Seno's high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

title: DB Red
description: The Red Ribbon Army returns! Their mission: to defeat Son Goku!

title: Cute Aggression
description: Natsuo, the ever-reliable office senpai, always calm, always composed, always there when someone needs help... is hiding his weak and anxious nature behind his perfect facade. How long can he keep up the act?

title: Yuri no Hajimari wa Dorei Kara
description: Chiyoko Hanamura, a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut, was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior, Sakine, approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask, as she handed Chiyoko a love letter. "Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However, the sender was unknown. For the sake of her adorable junior, and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity, Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...

title: unOrdinary
description: The world is not perfect. Learning to deal with its flaws is just a normal part of life. But there comes a point where these imperfections spawn a crushing realization… that something needs to change…

title: Shota Oni
description: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

title: Hetalia World★Stars: Gangsta
description: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

title: Bungou Stray Dogs: Wan!
description: Spin-off series about the everyday life of the members of the Armed Detective Agency and the Port Mafia.

title: Homura-sensei Is Probably Unpopular
description:
High-school student Hasumi-chan is drawn to Homura-sensei, a young, socially awkward biology teacher generally seen as weak and boring but recognized by her to be kind.   


---

title: War of the Adults
description: What makes a 'proper adult'? Inspired by the words of his late father, Yutaro Urashima sought to become an upstanding member of society by developing and strictly adhering to his own "Articles of Adulthood." Little did he know, however, that those same articles would go on to dramatically change the world...

title: Aliens, Baseball, and Civilization
description: Indifferent student Takatsugi-kun is living an uneventful life, until he meets Niina, a girl who's utterly obsessed with baseball. Though she seems to have nothing but baseball on her mind, Takatsugi finds himself drawn to her. Their relationship progresses smoothly... or does it?

title: The Urban Legend Files
description: Mokume is a first-year college student and occult fanatic! She hunts down an older student, Kugutsu, who is rumored to attract urban legends of all kinds… What will happen when she joins the Occult Club?

title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
description: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.

title: Blue Proustian Moment
description: Kazuki, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, and a straight-A student at a prestigious school for girls, meets Moeka, a wild girl from a rowdy school. What becomes of Kazuki when witnessing a steamy moment between Moeka and her boyfriend leaves her all shaken up...?! Find out in this seaside tale of two polar opposites and their fated encounter.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone
description:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!

title: Ikemen Dansou Reiya ni Koishiteru!!
description:
Assistant cameraman Osaka Kippei is one day invited to a cosplay event by his coworker where he meets the most handsome man he has ever seen: Ichinose Makoto. And through twists and turns they become friends.

In reality, however, Kippei is mistakenly thinking Makoto is man and Makoto, trying to avoid disappointing Kippei and losing him, is doing her best to act like a man for him. But what are these conflicting feelings they feel!? The mistaken love comedy between Kippei who thinks she's a man and Makoto the handsome crossplayer starts!!

title: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta
description:
In place of her sister, Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day, a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise, he was the son of her first love!

 To win the hand of the princess, he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner, Saltis, a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time, Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion, Lloyd refused to leave. 

"Please take me as your apprentice, until I get strong enough to defeat you!" 

So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time, which has remained frozen for so long, begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!

title: Taisho Junai Fukushuutan - Haha wo Yaki Korosareta Watashi wa Oni to Kasu
description:
Yuu is born to a concubine of the Todo family, a prominent family, and is mistreated and treated like a slave from an early age.
In particular, her half-sister Nadeshiko pretends to be friendly with Yuu in front of Shinnosuke, whom she has a crush on, but behind her back, Nadeshiko bullies Yuu to no end.
Yuu had hoped to be free someday, but she was unable to do so because she could not abandon her mother, who was locked up in a dungeon.
One day, her mother dies in an unexplained fire, and Yuu, who went to save her, also disappears.

Seven years later, Yuu, who was thought to have disappeared, grows up beautifully as if she were a different person, changes her name to Haruhi, returns to the Todo family, and begins to take revenge for the death of her murdered mother.

title: Nano Machine
description:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)

title: Kaiten no Albus
description: The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But... it was too late. The Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed Hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn't matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster.

title: Camera-senpai to Sewayaki Jouzu na Kouhai-chan
description:
The goal of the camera department manager, Ayato, is the ultimate beauty that he has set himself.

To take "boob pictures". 

The ideal that we once met at the beachIn order to take a picture of a beautiful girl with breasts, I involved my junior and assistant YukiLet the beautiful girls on campus take a "breast photo"! But--?

title: Ookami no Kawa wo Kabutta Hitsujihime
description: "Wolf" Rikujo Aki is working as a butler in the Land of the Sheep. She loved the quiet and peaceful life there, but by chance, she fell in love with Momo Siudafares, the third princess of the Sheep Kingdom, and became her tutor.

title: Sipiji Sonyeo
description:
In the race to determine the Zodiac gods, Nina the cat ranked 13th and failed to be chosen.
Because of Nina, the Zodiac race begins again for the first time in thousands of years, and the Twelve Gods descend into the world.

A seductive and lovely, full-fledged superpower fantasy girl action story!!

title: Tonari no Nobukuni-san wa Ore no Koto ga Suki na Ki ga Suru
description:
**In this sexy romantic comedy, a young woman tries to figure out how to seduce her crush!**

Nobukuni Nodoka has spent most of her adolescence with her face buried in a book. Dating was the furthest thing from her mind. But all that changed when Sasaki, a boy from Tokyo, transferred to her school. She doesn’t know the first thing about romance or relationships, but with tried-and-true advice from a dating guru named Meeko, maybe she’ll have a chance at love?!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*

title: Ooh La La
description:
The hilarious adventures of a newly couple.  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: Sora Yori Takaku
description: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

title: Kojiin Tamer
description:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

title: Chernobyl no Inori
description: An adaption the critically acclaimed novel *Chornobyl Prayer: A Chronicle of the Future* by Belarusian Nobel Laureate Svetlana Alexievich, a collection of several accounts of people affected by the 1986  Chornobyl nuclear catastrophe and its aftermath.

title: Vampire Knight Memories
description: Beginning as four bonus chapters following the end of 'Vampire Knight', 'Vampire Knight Memories' is now an official sequel series written and illustrated by Matsuri Hino. The series follows the events that occurred whilst Kaname slept for a thousand years, as well as his time in the future with Yuuki's daughters, Ai and Ren.

title: Fight Class 3
description:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

title: Yuumei VTuber no Ani Dakedo, Nazeka Ore ga Yuumei ni Natteita
description: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!

title: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess
description:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?

title: The Hitman Stans
description:
A legendary assassin found the light of life. It was an underground idol!

Endou Owaru is the most powerful assassin in the Fujisan-kai, a huge black market organization. He was feared as a “killing machine” because of his ruthless work and overwhelming fighting power, but one day he decides to retire. The reason for his decision was to live his life proudly with Kaorin of the underground idol Ro~Xesia.

Can a man covered in blood and sorrow protect the light of life that he has finally obtained?!

title: Tonari no Kurokawa-san
description:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.

title: RoOT / Route of OddTaxi
description:
*ODDTAXI* is back in action! 

The story of Hiroshi Odogawa, a poor cab driver, is interwoven with various characters and takes on a completely new form with new protagonists!

title: I Contracted Myself
description: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title: The Prince's First Love
description: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?

title: How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers
description:
Life never goes according to plan—something I had yet to learn back then.
Because of a friend from my past life, I begrudgingly read a male-oriented fantasy harem novel… only to wake up as a character inside it: Kang Nahyun.

Special perks for reincarnators? Ha! As if.
I had no money, no connections, and nothing but a hardcore survival mode to keep me going.

But just before high school, I awakened into the “Sniper” position, earning myself a spot at the Awakener Academy!

And if I can’t be the protagonist, then I’ll just hitch a ride on the protagonist’s flowery path, right?

So I make it my plan to stick close to Na Yuhan, the real hero of the story, snag a few scraps of luck, and quietly bow out…

Except something feels off.
With every passing day, my steps are veering further and further from the plan…

The chaotic Academy life of sunshine-heroine(?) Kang Nahyun begins now!
“How to Walk the Protagonist's Path of Flowers” — coming your way!

title: Boroboro no Elf-san o Shiawase ni Suru Kusuriuri-san
description:
An apothecary who runs a small workshop in a rural village is one day approached by a familiar pawnshop owner, asking if he would take in a tattered elf as material for medicine. Feeling a deep anger at the countless scars covering her body, the apothecary reaches out to her and decides to treat her, but...
___
**Note:** This manga is an adaptation of the light novel that was an adaptation of [the original webcomic](https://mangadex.org/title/5a0ab49a-1e9b-4f19-9f86-da5d7d50885a).

title: Stories of the Mask
description: The mask of Hannya, a jealous she-devil located in an old antique store, scrutinizes the darkness of men's hearts and knows the secrets of all the objects that have been accumulating there since time immemorial. Prepare well because certain death comes at odd times, and whether you are a young man or a tired old man, whatever she finds you, she will take you with her to hell.

title: Sakura Taisen Part 2
description: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN

title: Soshite, Mina ni natta
description:
In broad daylight, a horrific mass murder occurs, claiming the life of Mina, a high school student. Miraculously, she survives through a heart transplant. As Mina begins to settle back into a semblance of normalcy, she becomes alarmed by an overwhelming surge of murderous intent that she's never experienced before.

Unbeknownst to her, the heart she received belonged to Misako Shimizu, the very perpetrator of the mass murder.

Mina's parents watch in confusion and fear as their beloved daughter starts transforming into a person they can no longer recognize. The murderous urge only grows stronger and seems unstoppable.

Witness the beginning of an unprecedented family suspense drama!

(Source: Bookwalker)

title: Qíngxù Bìng
description:
Everybody is crazy except me. But is it a misfortune to be sane in a crazy world?

(Source: qq, edited)

title: Soul Catcher(S)
description: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!

title: Kurokami Seiso no Reikoku Bishoujo o Tasuketara, Ore to Futarikiri no Toki dake Dereru You ni Natta Ken
description: At Seiryo High School, where second-year student Minato Ichijo attends, there is a girl known as the “Cold Princess.” Her name is Rei Nanase. With her stunning beauty and exceptional talents, many admire her—yet she rejects all advances with an icy attitude. Minato, however, has little interest in romance due to personal reasons. Even though Rei sits next to him in class and works part-time at the same café, he pays her no special attention. One day, Minato stumbles upon Rei in a back alley, quarreling with a persistent man he recognizes as a customer who had been turned down by her at the café. Acting on impulse, he steps in to help. The very next day after work, Rei unexpectedly appears in the staff room—despite not being scheduled—and suddenly demands a kiss from Minato… Thus begins Minato’s bewildering days, swept up by a slightly offbeat kuudere young lady.

title: Byakuda no Hanamuko
description:
A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy.
Tsubaki, a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck, has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya, who is both beautiful and talented. Then, one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.

In the ancient capital Kyoto, a lovestory defying fate unfolds.

title: Tsuihou Sarenakatta Otoko ~Nidome no Jinsei wa Dogeza kara Hajimarimashita~
description: A mere villager, Cross Vish, somehow ended up joining the hero's party by some strange twist of fate. Cross, an ordinary man with no special powers whatsoever. Yet, for some reason, the heroes genuinely considered Cross a true comrade. There was no way he would ever be banished from the party. And that was precisely why Cross kept agonizing. What could a useless person like him possibly contribute to the hero's party? And then... Cross came to understand his role. At the very moment when the Demon King, on the verge of death, unleashed magic toward the hero—.

title: Mahou Shoujo no Majo Saiban
description:
"There is a girl among you who has become a witch."

On the morning she was supposed to start her first year of high school, Emma woke up inside a dimly lit cage. Imprisoned within a remote island prison mansion for a crime she doesn't remember committing, a confused Emma receives a declaration from a single owl:

"You have been identified as a potential witch — one who brings harm to this world."
"You will spend the rest of your life here as a prisoner."

The everyday life she took for granted completely collapsed. As Emma gets to know the other girls, all fellow witch candidates, during her imprisonment, the owl eventually gathers all the prisoners and declares:

"A witch trial will now commence."

And so began an utterly cruel game — a process of selecting, one by one from the thirteen girls, the witch... that is, the one to be executed.

title: Sanda
description:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.

title: Galnanajimi wa Koko ga Suki
description: Hiro, a high school boy living in the countryside, is walking along the beach one day when he is approached by a black gal who looks like she belongs in Shibuya. He is surprized to find out that she's Rio, his childhood friend who he used to play with in the old days! An explosive reunion × countryside × sea romcom with heart-throbbing situations, delivered in a double feature!!

title: Everyone Loves Her
description: With the sudden acquisition of the ability, Kang Mina’s life is completely turned upside down. Now, she stands at a crossroads where a single choice can lead to irreversible consequences. Amidst anger, confusion, and a suppressed sense of justice, Mina struggles with how to use her newfound power as she embarks on a new journey. Where will her power take her?

title: Haikyuu!! - Magical Horror Knight ~ Tricky Kisses (Doujinshi)
Lucifer's Wish
description:
A mysterious girl wakes up one day in a twisted and demonic world, filled with death, despair and nightmarish like creatures. May she find the true meaning of her relation to this world? Or shall she fall victim just like the rest...

Chapters and Volumes uploaded by the artist.

title: Uesugi-kun wa Onnanoko o Yametai
description: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...

title: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~
description: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!

title: Rosen Garten Saga
description:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)

title: Honjitsu no Urabe-san to
description:
Urabe Haruna, 24 years old.
Hobbies: smoking, drinking, cosplay.

Urabe Haruna, a girl whose daily posts on social media are accompanied by 1 word, “Today”, has been turned into a serialized comic! She spends her days messing with, teasing, and toying with her junior, Kinoshita-kun.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70408)

title: Mizu Zokusei no Mahoutsukai
description:
Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it's enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there's nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he's ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They're the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.

title: IDOL×IDOL STORY!
description:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
___
* [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)

title: The Male Lead Is Obsessed With My Health
description:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Hana-Uta Memoir
description: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.

title: Sword Art Online: Unital Ring
description: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!

title: Jujutsu Kaisen - Omoide wa Kimi ni Azuketoku (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Gojo Satoru x Itadori Yuuji

title: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~
description: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!

title: Majo to Youhei
description:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)

title: Ore to Seijo ga Dekiteru Koto ga Baretara Kono Party wa Houkai suru
description:
Rin, the gloomy-type mage, somehow ends up in a secret relationship with the party’s sweetheart, Sophia.

But for certain reasons, no one must ever find out.

Caught between “We can’t get caught!” and “But I still wanna do it!” Rin’s heart is ready to explode!

title: Ane no Musume (Serialization)
description: Her trust broken by her girlfriend, Saya moves out of the room they were living in, and, with nowhere else to go, she has no choice but to stay with her sister's family. There, she reunites with her sister's daughter, Rui, who she often used to play with when she was younger. Rui used to be such an innocent girl, but now she's almost like succubus meant to lead people astray, boasting calculating smiles and charm unbefitting of her age. Day after day Saya is filled with confusion and doubt, her resolve gradually wavering away due to Rui's intimate sense of distance, until eventually she loses sight of any reason to turn Rui down...

title: J⇔M
description: J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld. Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school. When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.

title: Half Succubus wo Hirotta
description: Take a child half succubus and half human.

title: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou
description:
A man who yearned for a life of freedom reincarnates into another world and becomes a carrier—a non-combative class considered useless. Can he make use of his skills to live his dream life or could he be meant for something more? A sexy isekai manga about a man proving there’s more to him than his class!

Sei has always yearned for a life of freedom, and when he’s reborn into another world, it seems like he would finally have his dream life. Except he was born as a “carrier,” a non-combative class that mostly uses their abilities to transport goods. But Sei has found a way to use his powers both in and out of fights, surviving on his own despite his low class. And while he travels the land seeing sights and picking up women, he’ll prove that a lowly carrier is capable of conquering the world!

title: Yuusha-goroshi no Hanayome
description:
In the light of day, Sister Alicia Snowell is a faithful and devoted bride of the gods, dedicated to serving the Holy Church and its followers. In the shadows, she's one of the Church’s top inquisitors, tasked with hunting down and eliminating heretics by any means necessary.

Alicia's latest mission: assassinate the Hero Elcyon, slayer of the mighty Demon Lord, whose growing fame threatens to eclipse the Church's political power. In order to kill the divinely protected, supposedly unkillable Hero, Alicia first needs to win Elcyon's heart. There's just one problem — Elcyon turns out to be a girl named Cion! Alicia's at a loss for what to do, but while she tries to figure out how to seduce a girl, more trouble brews on the horizon. With remnants of the demon army still at large, Alicia and Cion face one deadly supernatural battle after another! Where will the two girls' intertwining paths lead them?
___
* **[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-killing-bride)**
* **Character Designer:** [Enji](https://mangadex.org/author/c2125541-abf3-4041-839d-f303e2987659)

title: Kuro no Senki II - Isekai Teni Shita Boku ga Saikyou na no wa Bed no Ue dake no You desu
description: Kurono Crawford (Chrono Crawford), a noble of Cepheus Empire had a secret. It was that he came from a Different world... Modern Japan. Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the "Harem King." Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire's rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.

title: Omega Tribe
description: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

title: Isekai Koushoku Musou Roku: Isekai Tensei no Chie to Chikara o, Tada Hitasura ×××× Suru Tame ni Tsukau
description:
Reincarnated in another world, Sao acquires the class of Rod Master! However, he uses that special ability not to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all his might!
___
**Character Designer:** [Kubocha](https://mangadex.org/author/cc505e53-8402-47d3-9c69-551552ae73aa)

title: Tonari no Kuderella wo Amayakashitara, Uchi no Aikagi wo Watasu Koto ni Natta
description:
Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was "Quderella" because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
"I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it"

title: Harukawa-san wa Kyou mo Ueteiru
description: Meet Natsumi Harukawa, a young office lady. During work, she is asocial and constantly looks cranky. However, the truth is that Harukawa-san is simply very hungry, and spends her time after work eating delicious foods.

title: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou Sareta Senshi no Mujikaku Zamaa~
description:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline.
___
[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

title: Whispering the Rain
description:
Life has been tough since Viola's Dad passed away 3 years ago. After days by days training, she embarks on a mission to explore ruins hoping for a fortune, together with two explorers she hired, Rain and Bleu. 

Little does she know, that this expedition will cause her life to turn inside out. What she hopes for a fortune, goes into a curse instead. A strong curse which could turn her into a demon, a fairytale like in which people already think of as extinct.

title: High Teen Boogie
description: Momoko Miyashita is at the top of her class at school, but her home life is another story. An orphan, she lives with her aunt and cousin and works long hours at their coffee shop. One day, a transfer student named Shou Fujimaru joins her class. He looks like a delinquent with his pompadour, motorcycle, and leather jacket, but in reality, he's the son of a distinguished family. He falls in love with Momoko, and is ready to do anything to meet her standards, but a romance like this won't be accepted by the people around them…

title: Bedtime Agreement
description: As the eldest son of the Li Group's President, Li Dao'an has a secret: He is intersex. At the age of 13, Li Dao'an's secret was accidentally revealed by the Chu Group's heir, Chu Xiao. Despite being old rivals and often bickering, Chu Xiao didn't mock or shun Li Dao'an, but instead proposed to him, surprising everyone.

title: WITCHRIV
description: A girl named Nona lives in plain sight among humans, hiding her true identity as a mage as she spends her days in peace with her best friend Lovi. But one day, Nona uses magic to fix Lovi's glasses and subsequently catches the attention of the Bureau of Magic Surveillance. A simple good deed becomes the trigger that sets Nona's destiny in motion...

title: Turning Point
description:
Baek Sarang, who was comfortable eating alone, meditating alone, and drinking alone.
Yu Pyeonghwa wants to get along with others even at a loss.
Love and peace, who have lived conflicting lives, meet each other and learn a new way of life.
A realistic romance that is more adult than you think and more childish than you think

title: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasen node
description:
A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn't a student or the homeroom teacher... it's the janitor.

At the time of their summoning, the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul, but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him, his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension, he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years, with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120,000. From a society that rejected him, he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was...
___
**Character Designer:** [Iwamoto Eiri](https://mangadex.org/author/6072165b-41b3-4b12-9afc-f99efff4cb72)

title: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai wo Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~
description: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.

title: Yashaou No Saiai Shitagerareta Chiyu No Otome Wa Dekiai Sareru
description:
Mei, the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters, was raised in a cold environment, lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile, her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga, the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger, but Ryouga is actually a gentle, intelligent, and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses, and invites her to "become my princess."

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)

title: Osore: Reiwa Kaidan
description: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.

title: Kanojo no Real ga Kirinukenai!
description: Riku Mikami, who is starting as a university student in the spring, finds out that his favorite VTuber is taking a hiatus. The one who cheers him up is Rui Saionji, his classmate. Will Riku resolve to make Rui his "oshi"?

title: Gyakusatsu Happy End
description: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.

title: Hwansaengui Jeongseok
description:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
